Summary Heading: Totally remodeled and a great Disney location
Summary: This is an older motel with outside doors but the inside is very nice with totally remodeled rooms. So from the inside it seemed like a newer hotel. Considering people often leave early to get to the Parks, it didn't seem too loud. The convenience of a McDonalds and Panera right next door was nice for a snack. Since the Parks are right across the street, the location can't be beat. Great stay overall.
Manager Response: Hi ScottS898! It's great to hear your family enjoyed your recent stay! We appreciate your compliments regarding our updated rooms and ideal location. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We checked in after a long day of travel (and a canceled flight the  night before). We were greeted by an extremely rude woman at the front desk who informed us our reservation had been cancelled. We hadn‚Äôt cancelled it. We had missed the first night due to our cancelled flight and the hotel had not reached out to us so we assumed it was fine to show up and check in the next night. The woman behind the desk informed us we had no room to stay in. After her berating us for five minutes we finally asked ‚Äúare there other rooms available?‚Äù since she didn‚Äôt even offer to check and see if there were. She finally agreed to check in awkward silence for another five minutes. She found a room for us. Why she didn‚Äôt just look in the first place I don‚Äôt understand. The room itself was ok,
Manager Response: Hi Juliawx203pz! If a guest fails to arrive on their reservation date without contacting the hotel, the booking will be cancelled as a ‚Äúno-show‚Äù the following morning. This is standard practice. It‚Äôs great that another room was available for you as we tend to run at full occupancy during the holiday season. We‚Äôre disappointed to hear our newly renovated rooms and Custom Comfort beds were not to your liking as we usually receive compliments on them. Thank you for your feedback. Have a Happy New Year!

Summary: Recently stayed at this hotel for the first time; checked in 11/21 and checked out 11/25. Our usual go-to good neighbor hotel was closed for remodeling so we tried Camelot. Upon arrival the staff was very nice‚Ä¶the valet staff was friendly and helpful and the front desk attendant was very pleasant. It‚Äôs valet parking only (which I was a bit unsure of at first), but it was so convenient and I actually felt like our car was safer from dings and whatnot. Cost us $103 to park our vehicle for the days we were there. I definitely dislike the additional parking fee since we‚Äôre already a paying customer, but most of the hotels around Disneyland are the same way so we knew to expect that. Room was decent, pretty basic but didn‚Äôt need much more. Room was clean and that‚Äôs really what
Room tip: Maybe try to request a 4th floor room to keep from having noisy upstairs neighbors.
Manager Response: Hi Havers40! It's great to hear you and your family enjoyed your recent stay at Camelot Inn & Suites. We appreciate your compliments regarding our updated guest rooms, friendly customer service and ideal location near Disneyland. In the future, we'd be happy to request a top floor room to ensure there are no guests above you. Thanks for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again next time!

Summary Heading: Amazing stay at an amazing place
Summary: The suited are amazing, so comfortable and huge! Location is perfect! And we had an amazing view of the fireworks from our balcony. It could get quite noisy at night but I think you get that at any of the hotels on this street. Wouldn't book anywhere else for future visits!
Manager Response: Hi hollieb909! We are so happy to hear that our spacious Two Room Family Suites stood out to you. Thank you for choosing the Camelot Inn & Suites as your home away from home when visiting the Disney parks. Looking forward to your future visits!

Summary: Location near to the park is all this place has to offer  Room tho renovated did not include aircon. Stayed in room 422 - aircon goes humming, drumming and shuttering throughout the first nite. ( did not sleep well)  There goes my first day in Disneyland ‚Ä¶ like a zombie Next the water pressure is bad  The tap fr the sink was leaking water even as it pushed the water to the shower head above .. Lousy shower- NOT invigorating after a hot day at the park.  Pillows were too soft,  ask for more pillows- reception says no extra pillows? First hotel tt deny pillows‚Ä¶hotel must be  thinking there will be more guests beside the official registered 4 which was accounted and paid for!!!  So what is good.  ONLY Strict security..  we were quite unlucky tt there was no firework at all on 7-9
Room tip: Climate change affect us. But visit park with temperature at 37 can kill even me fr Hot hot...
Manager Response: Hi Hilda H! We are sorry to hear your AC and showerhead weren't working properly. If this had been reported to the front desk, our maintenance team would have been happy to repair these issues or move you to another room. We're glad you appreciated our close proximity to the Disney parks. Each guest room is newly renovated and offers a view of Disneyland from the landing outside each room.  We hope you enjoyed your time at the "Happiest Place on Earth!"

Summary: I will keep coming back to this hotel because the location is amazing. It is so convenient to be able to walk back and forth between the room and Disneyland. It is also wonderful to watch the fireworks from the pool area. It is also nice to be directly next to McDonald‚Äôs and Panera My one complaint is that you can hear everything that happens outside your door. The window and door don‚Äôt do anything to block the noise of people walking by and talking or standing outside their room next to yours talking on their phones. Oddly I didn‚Äôt hear much noise from the rooms next to ours, just that outside hallway. It is jarring to wake up at midnight to the sound of people talking, sounding like they are inside your room, as they are walking back to their room from the parks.
Manager Response: Hi 720kathrynh! We are delighted to be your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland, and we appreciate your compliments regarding our comfortable rooms and ideal location. In the future, we'd be happy to request a room in a quieter area towards the back if you prefer. Looking forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Great family suite for a family of 5
Summary: We stayed here for our disney trip and it was pretty good.  Nothing enough to not stay here again considering there aren't many options across the street from Disneyland that sleep 5 comfortably.  Beds and room were great.  Room was clean.  Some minor complaints: 1.  TV in room with king bed didn't swivel so you could see it from the bed. 2.  The door was hard to close and you had to slam it potentially waking up neighbors 3.  Only one sink for such a large room considering it had so much room for two sinks. 4.  Would be nice if there was a table in the room you could actually eat at.  The room has a couch with sofa table/ottoman and another area for 4 people to sit with a knee height small ottoman.  If that area had a normal height small table in the same place it would be
Manager Response: Hello! It sounds like our Two Room Family Suite was a great choice for your family of 5, and we appreciate your feedback regarding your experience. Our maintenance team checked the pool chlorine and the chemicals are properly balanced. We hope to see you again next time!

Summary Heading: Great Stay with my 4 generation family
Summary: This is our second time at the Camelot, and  it was just as great this time (8 yrs later). We booked the ADA Family Suite because we were traveling with my 79 year old mother. I also had my daughters, son-in-law and grandchildren. We booked with my husband's military discount but he had to back out of the trip. Michelle was great and was still able to get us a good rate. The suite was great. It was clean and spacious with two handicap accessible bathrooms, one with a tub, the other with a shower. The staff was so friendly, although they didn't clean rooms daily because of Covid, they checked on us daily and made sure we were stocked up on everything. The beds were so comfortable, which is vitally important when you've been walking all day in the park! One Stop Mobility (located
Manager Response: Hi there! Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! It is lovely to hear that your whole family's stay was enjoyable and memorable. We appreciate your kind comments regarding our newly renovated guest rooms, helpful front desk and housekeeping team members, and our pool and laundry facilities. Looking forward to seeing you again in the future. Take care!

Summary: The first things I would like to comment on is how friendly and helpful the staff was. The receptionist was perhaps the most efficient I've seen and I was off to my room in no time. I had booked a double queen and found it to be fresh & clean upon entry. More towels & pillows then I'm used to and the toiletries were pleasant as well. Being a coffee junkie I ran out of the provided coffee but no worries after asking, more was brought up to my room. The bedding was crisp and clean, although the mattress was a bit firm for my taste. Outside noise wasn't an issue nor was adjoining rooms, so I slept very good. The grounds were clean and well kept and by fist glance there was ample parking available at least during my stay. The pool and hot tub seemed nice although it was to brisk for
Manager Response: Hi, imsfan! Thank you for your 5 star review! It is wonderful to hear that our property stood out to you- from our friendly team members to our renovated rooms to our ideal location. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Won‚Äôt accept valid credit card from Mastercard
Summary: I am beyond frustrated with the service at this hotel. They let me make my reservation with my Mastercard then when I arrived they told me they can‚Äôt accept it because it‚Äôs from apple. What kind of ridiculous policy is that? Their excuse was ‚Äúit just doesn‚Äôt work‚Äù I asked if we could try and she replied ‚Äúno‚Äù it has a chip/stripe and Mastercard Goldman Sachs logo. Never have I been so mistreated by simply having the card they don‚Äôt prefer. You can‚Äôt pick and choose which cards you accept with no policy stating so online. I also believe this is a violation of Mastercards policy and I will be reporting it to them. I‚Äôd advise you to look elsewhere to say as this place might not accept your payment when you arrive.
Manager Response: Hi, 48nicholasee. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you encountered in regards to our credit card compliance policy. We do accept Mastercard. However, Apple credit cards do not have verifiable numbers on them and we were unable to accept them for payment until now. We shared your feedback with our general manager, and he decided to change this policy. We are now accepting Apple cards with chips and we thank you for bringing this to our attention.

Summary Heading: Amazing location, spacious room for 6 and a price that couldn‚Äôt be beat! What else can you ask for?
Summary: We had a wonderful time at the Camelot. They upgraded us to a Family Suite with a balcony looking towards Disneyland. Our last night we were able to watch the fireworks, which was awesome. The room was clean, comfortable and spacious. Tons of storage to be able to spread out.   Our family of 4 stayed in one room and grandparents in the other room. The location can‚Äôt be beat as well. A quick walk back to the room made it easy to take a mid day break with our littles (7 and 5). The housekeeping staff even arranged our kids studies in the bed which was a fun surprise. Highly recommended and will look to stay again next time we are at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi, andyv355! It sounds like our spacious Two Room Family Suite was the perfect choice for your family. We are delighted to hear your stay was memorable and we appreciate your great feedback. Take care!

Summary: We stayed here for one night! Room was clean and modern. Beds and pillow comfy. Check in and out was really easy. The valet parking was easy as well. Location amazing!! At Disneyland main entrance in 3 minutes. Lots of restaurants near by.  We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Hi, Ellie0770! Thank you for your great review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and ideal location. Looking forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Easy walk to Disney  Quiet room
Summary: We stayed  here for  Halloween time,  very clean room , quiet , friendly staff , close to food, watched the fire works one night from the pool area , very cool ,  rented a scooter on property ,  they brought towels and emptied our trash when needed,  overall a great place to stay while visiting the parks ,
Manager Response: Hi Debbosl, Thank you for your 5 star review! It's great to hear your family took advantage of the fireworks view from our 4th floor pool area. We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our convenient location and renovated rooms. See you next time!

Summary Heading: Great location next to Disneyland and spacious
Summary: Hotel is just opposite Disneyland and a very easy walk. We could come back to the hotel in the afternoon for a rest before heading to the park in the evening. The rooms are spacious, with a lot of table space to put our things. There is a fridge and microwave, albeit slightly old and small, and the fridge does not have a freezer section.   Parking is valet only, and the valet staff are friendly and efficient. You send a message to say you want to get your car, and the car is usually waiting at the porch by the time we come down.  Our room was on a higher floor facing the park and we enjoyed the fireworks through our window. Downside is it faces the main road and there is a lot of traffic noise - they did not do any soundproofing on the windows.  Overall an enjoyable experience
Manager Response: Thank you for highlighting our spacious, well-appointed rooms and our ideal location in your review. We're very happy to hear your family enjoyed your stay. We do apologize if some street noise from Harbor Blvd was noticeable. In the future, we'd be happy to request a quiet room away from the front of the property. Thanks again for your feedback!

Summary: I came with a 2 year old and booked a king room with the side sleeper for my toddler's first trip to Disneyland. We didn't want to bother driving to/fro our house before/after a long day of play, and we took a break in our room half way.   The room was bigger than expected and nicely renovated. Our room had a little balcony that was absolutely perfect for privately viewing the Disneyland fireworks. I was super happy that we could watch them in our PJs. Super short walk to the gates of Disneyland. We debated getting Camelot or the sister hotel Tropicana since that was a smidge closer but it really didn‚Äôt make a difference at all, and I liked how Camelot felt a bit more intimate/smaller. They had separate pool towels by the pool and the room‚Äôs mini fridge and microwave came in
Manager Response: Hi apassingfrancy! It's great to hear your family enjoyed your recent stay in our newly upgraded rooms. Our close proximity to Disneyland allows our guests the convenience of walking to and from the parks as they please. We appreciate your feedback regarding your bedding and we'll check with Housekeeping regarding the dryer's settings. Hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: I have to say that I have stayed along Harbor blvd many times but this was the first at Camelot. I loved the location to DLand, we watched fireworks at the pool and the room was clean. We even could leave our car in their parking lot while we were at DCA on our check out day till 2 pm or we could pay $18-20 dollars if we were going to stay after 2pm. There are a good amount of restaurants within walking distance. We will definitely stay there again because of the great experience we had.
Manager Response: Hi Adriennelin, Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted you and your family took advantage of the fireworks view from our pool deck. Looking forward to seeing you again in the future! Take care.

Summary Heading: Great visit with only one small problem.
Summary: My family and I had a great visit to Disneyland and stayed at this hotel for the first time since they remodeled. We‚Äôve used this hotel many times in the past and we were pleased with how cleaned up their rooms were. The only thing that we would complain about is the fact that in spite of the great remodel, there were no places to hang wet towels. Aside from the very small towel bar in the bathroom there was absolutely no place to hang anything for the four of us. We ended up hanging towels from the tall headboards that were brand new. This resulted in a very, very shabby look for the hotel room. We joked that we would have to bring our own towel hooks on command strips to the next visit because the nice new room looked ridiculous with towels hanging all over the walls. My
Manager Response: Hi pdboese, We appreciate your thorough review and we'll bring up your feedback regarding towel hooks to the GM. As a temporary policy due to the pandemic, housekeeping team members will clean rooms prior to arrival and after check out only. Guests requiring extra linens, towels, trash removal are welcome to call the front desk and our team members will assist. It's great to hear your family enjoyed your stay. See you next time!

Summary: Spent four nights in a 2 room suite with family.  Location is fantastic, rooms are nice but a little dark with the new wall paper.  Having the microwave and refrigerator in the room is extremely beneficial for families.  Pool was really fun and a nice getaway after a busy day.  Employees were very friendly, especially Johnny Gomez, the parking check in attendant.  The only negative was that they did away with daily maid service.  We had to call down for any supplies we needed including towels, toilet paper and garbage can liners.  The front desk said this was implemented due to covid but I've traveled to other cities and hotels and always had daily maid service.  I made beds everyday, collected towels and changed out garbage cans (I don't like coming in from a long day to a
Manager Response: Hi, Nitarox! We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay. Housekeeping service is limited due to Covid and minimizing contact; full service will resume in the near future. We're happy to hear your family enjoyed our terrace level pool and newly renovated Two Room Family Suite. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: This hotel location is absolutely awesome if you‚Äôre staying for a Disney trip! Everything is updated, clean, and comfortable! The price was reasonable and the staff were all very friendly and helpful! We will definitely stay here again for our next trip to Disney!
Manager Response: Hi, Jadem664! Thank you so much for your 5 star review. We are delighted your family enjoyed your stay in our newly renovated rooms. Looking forward to seeing you again in the future. Take care!

Summary Heading: Convenient location, old facilities, beware the reservation system
Summary: Pros + Super convenient, short walk to Disneyland entrance + Mostly clean rooms + Staff was helpful and pleasant   Cons - Decor and everything in the rooms feel very old and slightly worn - Elevator is a little sketchy and dirty - Website reservation system is unreliable  The Camelot Inn & Suites is an average hotel with its main selling point being the vicinity to Disneyland's entrance.  The rooms are clean but are definitely showing their age with older. worn bathrooms and decor.   I stayed here once but on our second stay there was a big headache with their website reservation system.  I made our reservations well ahead of our trip directly on the Camelot website.  I received an email confirmation.  I then made a change to the reservation that same day and received a
Manager Response: Hi bcvc, We are excited to share with you that we have recently completed a full remodel of each guest room. Photos and more information regarding our beautifully upgraded rooms can be found on our website. We apologize for the inconvenience you encountered upon check in. The issue with our booking engine has been resolved. Please rest assured it is working properly. We hope to welcome you back in the future and hear your feedback on our newly renovated rooms.

Summary: My cousin and I stayed here 4 nights. You can‚Äôt beat the location to Disneyland. Rooms were on the smaller and older side but very clean. Beds were comfortable. Our room was directly in front but the street noise did not bother us. Front desk was helpful and friendly. Shout out to Manager Michelle who recognized and greeted us outside of the hotel. I would definitely book again.
Manager Response: Hi MicheleL56, Thanks for your great review! We will be sure to pass your compliment along to Michelle. Also, we're excited to share we are in the process of renovating all guest rooms and hope you will be able to check them out during your next stay. Take care!

Summary Heading: Nice Disneyland option for Older Guests
Summary: Our Family ( 4 adults & 3 children) stayed just prior to the corona shut down of Disneyland. We booked the two room suite and it worked well for our needs. One rest room for 7 can be a challenge at times. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The plus we didn‚Äôt count on was the ‚Äúscooter rental‚Äù available at the hotel. Two of us are over 70 and the walking distance can be a challenge at Disneyland. The ability to pick up an electric scooter on site allowed us to go all day with the children. This is the first time we used this option and it was a trip saver
Manager Response: Dear B9266AYjamesc, We are delighted you took advantage of our on-site scooter rental shop. It's nice to hear your family enjoyed your stay and made great memories. We thank you for your feedback and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We had a bad experience upon arrival.  Just not very friendly staff werent greeted at all upon arrival,(no one is perfect) we all have our daysüòè couldn't get rooms requested, one of the elevators was broken and was charged 3 times for our room accidentally. But! They did fix  the charges immediately and thankfully we got our money back that same day-  so this is why i give it 3 stars!! I emailed Camelot with our experience  and to our surprise  they responded quickly and offered their apologies and a great rate for our future return. Barbie the reservations manager was very sweet and made things better The remodeled rooms are very nice and beds are comfortable. I sincerely appreciate  the fact that this hotel took attention to our issues  and resolved it!
Manager Response: Dear Kittyscakes18, We are happy to hear our team members were helpful in resolving the issues that occurred during your stay. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to make it up to you. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Take care!

Summary: Our stay was great at this location. We asked for a high floor room and got exactly what we requested. Staff was fantastic at check in and check out, and did a great job dealing with a different difficult customer while we were waiting on our Lyft ride when leaving. They were fantastic at storing luggage pre check-in and post check-out. The only neutral thing I have to say is that the non-remodeled rooms are definitely a bit worn (couch was a bit threadbare, needed more convenient outlets, etc), but they are in the process of remodeling the rest of the rooms this year as I understand it. The location can‚Äôt be beat for Disneyland/California Adventure, and the price was good as well.
Manager Response: Sear dctdye, We are delighted you enjoyed your accommodations and we hope your family created many magical memories at the "Happiest Place on Earth!" Our room renovations are expected to be complete later this year and we hope you will able to experience them during your next visit.

Summary: Location is perfect for going to Disney Park. However be aware that parking is $19 a day (valet) and you are expected to move your car by 2:00pm after the 11am checkout otherwise you get charged an additional $19. So be aware of this if you stay, checkout, and go to Disney with it in mind that you can leave your car there for free- you cannot, will cost you another $19 (similar price to park at Disneyland itself so weigh that). Other than that- friendly hotel staff and Valet Staff. Room was clean and big (2 queens) and perfectly fit four our trip to Disneyland. Can see the matterhorn from this hotel, it is 7 minute quick walk to front gate. Prices were reasonable and around the avg near here. Recommend it all in all.
Manager Response: Dear JackWillsSD, Thank you for your feedback. We're happy you appreciated our close proximity to Disneyland and our spacious guest rooms. We hope to welcome you back again soon! Take care.

Summary: my boyfriend and i stayed here when we went to disney land such a quick walk from the park! very clean room and very nice staff! so many restaurants within walking distance also! can‚Äôt wait to return!!
Manager Response: Dear 678jennat, We are delighted to hear our friendly team members, comfortable rooms and convenient location stood out to you. Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I stayed there with 9 family members over Christmas 2019.  We had some concerns with the hotel and when we presented them to management we were treated disrespectfully.  Now we are being completely ignored by them and they are not willing to work with us regarding our concerns. The hotel is dirty and not kept up for the cost, location is good sure but the experience is horrible
Manager Response: Dear Kellwatts80, We take customer feedback seriously and management diligently responds to all guest concerns. If there is something you wish to discuss, please contact the hotel at 714-635-7275 so we can research your comments and put you in contact with the correct supervisor.

Summary: Stayed here recently on a 5 day trip to Disneyland.  The proximity to the park is great.  Very easy to walk back and forth if need be.  Did this a couple of times to change clothes or to just take a break.  Didn't feel like I was losing any time at the park having to go ll the way back to the hotel.  Stayed in  renovated room with 2 queens.  Pretty typical setup with beds, sink, bathroom etc.  Really liked the extra shelving and big shelf/entertainment center thing across the room under the TV.  It made it really easy to organize all the stuff I bought at Disney before I had to pack it all away.  They offered luggage storage so I could check out early and go enjoy my last day in the park before a late flight.  My LYFT driver found it easily and was able to pick me up.  Two
Manager Response: Dear jodokast1616, Thank you for highlighting our ideal location and well-appointed rooms in your review. Our proximity to Disneyland allows guests to walk back to the hotel anytime for a break or to drop off souvenirs. We appreciate your constructive feedback and will notify our maintenance team of the water pressure issue you experienced. Looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed here for 8 nights Jan 2020.  Fresh, modern, newly renovated room with lots of storage space for our large group. Room was very clean upon check-in and housekeepers did a great job servicing room daily.  While there is certainly a few neighbouring motels closer to the main gates, the Camelot is certainly the nicest and we've stayed at them all.  That said, we were in a newly renovated room so I cannot speak to the not yet updated rooms. Definitely worth walking the extra minute to have a fresh, new room. Also, be sure and ask for an upper-level room with a fireworks view.
Manager Response: Dear Junglefever1977, We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our newly renovated rooms. Thank you for taking the time to write your review. Looking forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland with the family. This is an older style motel with exterior hallways but the newly remodeled rooms are very well done! The rooms are really large, and the beds, pillows and sheets are extremely comfortable. The new carpet is cushy and the furniture is great. There are so many shelves and drawers to store your clothes and other things which really helps the room stay clean and clutter free. It is a 5 minute walk to the security line at Disneyland. So convenient. Soundproofing is decent, not perfect but it was quiet enough that none of us had any trouble sleeping.  There are a couple of reasons I can‚Äôt give it 5 stars. First, the pool and hot tub were closed while we were there. They did give us the option of using the
Manager Response: Dear Devroar, Having you as our guest was a pleasure. We really appreciate your kind words regarding our renovated rooms, convenient location, and customer service. Thank you for providing great feedback. We look forward to your next stay! Take care.

Summary: Very nice hotel. We had a 2 room suite. Super spacious. Small kitchen area with microwave. Each room has its own mini fridge. The beds were very comfortable. Had a balcony in each room and both faced Disneyland. We were able to watch the fireworks each night.Only two things could have made the room better. One would have been to have a separate toilet from the rest of the bathroom and If there has been first floor rooms.All parking is by valet only. The staff were very welcoming and accommodating to all our needs.There was a laundry facility on the first floor,  two dollars for washing and two dollars for drying. There was a nice upper level pool and hot tub. Also on the lower level was stroller rental and electric scooter rental.It was less than a five minute walk from the
Manager Response: Dear jbzgirl73, It sounds like our spacious Two Room Family Suite was the perfect choice for your stay. We're delighted you enjoyed your accommodations, hotel location, and terrace level pool with Disney view. Your feedback is very much appreciated and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Under a 5 minute walk to the main entrance was perfect.  Close to McDonalds for an easy feed - but I recommend Mimi‚Äôs for all your meals - cheaper and way better qualm than anything around the area or in the park.   We stayed in a newly renovated queen twin bed room which was clean and comfortable. Fresh towels everyday was great and all staff were courteous and friendly.    Highly recommend Karmel Shuttle service too.
Manager Response: Dear Mark H, We are delighted you enjoyed your accommodations and appreciated our close proximity to Disneyland. It's also great to hear you were satisfied with Karmel Shuttle service. Thanks for your review!

Summary: We stayed here for a night when visiting Disneyland. Our room appears recently renovated so is modern and relatively clean. It is within good walking distance from Disneyland, and right around the corner we were able to grab some McDonalds for breakfast before beginning the day. On-site valet parking was fairly priced. The only thing that troubled me was the clinking sound of the heating system at night. The room was recently renovated but the systems still need some tlc.
Manager Response: Dear xzbpkwy72, Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback regarding your newly renovated room. We hope your family created many magical memories at "The Happiest Place on earth!"

Summary: We spent two nights here. We did not get a renovated room, but we had no issue with the room we had even though it was definitely tired looking.  The room was clean, water pressure was good (we were on the top floor), the WI-FI was good, the mattress was OK, and the location to the main entrance to Disneyland was less than a five minute walk away. There is a McDonald's next door, and an IHop, Denny's and a couple other restaurants just a few minutes walk up the road. Would recommend staying here for a visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear missedme, Your comments are appreciated, and we're happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations and hotel location. We look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth.

Summary: Booked on Hotels.com and got a gorgeous renovated room.  Check in was quick and friendly.  Loved the renovations made.  Very inviting and very clean.  More than enough drawers and counter space to put your souvenirs from Disneyland on or in.  Beds were very comfortable.  Not too soft and not too hard..............just perfect.  Water pressure was excellent and had no problem with hot water during morning shower.  A second sink would have been useful.  Five minute or so walk to Disneyland.  IHOP and Denny‚Äôs close by.  Price was high but well worth it.  If I did not get a renovated room I would probably complain about the price but I didn‚Äôt so I‚Äôm happy.
Manager Response: Dear 987alann,  It is nice to hear you appreciated the complimentary upgrade to a renovated room. In the future to guarantee a  renovated room, please book through the hotel directly with your Returning Guest Discount. Thank you for providing great feedback regarding our custom "Dreamy Knights" mattresses. A good night's rest is very important when spending all day having fun at the Disney parks.   Wishing you and your family a happy holiday season.

Summary: We stayed here for four nights this past week to have easy access to Disneyland. Parking is valet only for $15 (plus tax) per night parking fee. We did not get one of the newly updated rooms, but we weren‚Äôt really expecting it either so no big deal. Our room was clean and comfortable and the staff we encountered was friendly and helpful. If you‚Äôre too tired to stay late for fireworks at the park, you can see a side view clearly from each floor‚Äôs balcony or the 4th floor pool deck. No restaurants on site but there is a McDonald‚Äôs next door which made for a quick, cheap, and portable breakfast for our 5-7 minute walk to Disneyland. I‚Äôm excited to see the renovations being completed and we will happily stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear kelliplansitall, We're happy your family enjoyed the Disney fireworks view from our 4th floor pool deck. Your comments are appreciated and we look forward to your next visit. We do have a limited number of renovated rooms available to book through our website if you'd like to try them out in the future. Happy Holidays!

Summary: 25th wedding anniversary.  Weren't bringing the kids so didn't want to stay at DL hotel as we just wanted someplace close and clean and nice while we enjoyed the park for 4 days.  Updated rooms were awesome.  Cleaned really well every day.  Couldn't be happier and will be back again!!
Manager Response: Dear linetp2014, Thank you for choosing our property for your anniversary trip to the Happiest Place on Earth. We're delighted you enjoyed your accommodations and we appreciate your great feedback.

Summary: Our family of four stayed in a suite for 5 nights, had one of the nicely upgraded rooms. The king bedroom was separated by a door from the room with the 2 queen beds and bathroom. The beds were comfortable, the staff all very nice. You can see the Disney fireworks from the balcony or even better from the pool deck. Close enough to easily come back for the young ones to get an afternoon nap/break in the long days on your feet at Disney. Definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear OhioPrincipessa, We're happy your stay was memorable and your family enjoyed your Two Bedroom Suite. It's also great to hear you took advantage of the Disney fireworks view from our terrace level pool. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Trip to Disneyland with friends. One local, one from NV and me from Canada. Chose the family suite so we could each have our own bed. This worked well. Beds were very comfortable and clean. TV in each room, one bathroom with sink space and separate space for toilet and shower/bath. Have to go through bedroom to get to bath area. The suite had two fridges, but we thought from the online description and photos there was a kitcenette. Nope, only two fridges and a microwave. No cups for the coffee maker or any kind of dishes/utensils.    In general it was ok. Room needs an update. Very dark and dated, but housekeeping did keep it clean. Convenient location made the bad more bearable.   We found the water temperature very inconsistent when showering, ran very cold most mornings.  On
Manager Response: Dear Jen J, Thank you for your feedback. The online description states there is a wet bar with dining table and chairs. There is no mention of a kitchenette. We apologize if coffee cups were not provided in your room. Housekeeping would have been happy to bring some if requested. We are planning on renovating all guest rooms in 2020 and hope you will be able to experience the new upgrades in the future. For reference, our sister property next door, the Tropicana Inn & Suites, offer rooms with kitchenettes.

Summary: Old hotel, but very close to Disneyland.  Great for walking with young children Hotel needs a facelift, but it wasn't too bad.  Could use a continental breakfast . Carpet needs to be upgraded.Beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Departure23928752047, Thank you for providing feedback regarding your stay. Our room renovations will be completed next year. We hope to welcome you back in the future and would love to hear your comments on our updated look.

Summary: I should have read the other reviews. We booked a renovated room as shown on the website and then when we showed up we received an old outdated room. The management would not help at all. They would not move our room our compensate us for the misleading information. DO NOT STAY HERE.
Manager Response: Kayleigh and Krystyn, As we previously explained, our renovated rooms were not available to book online at the time your reservation was made and you received a confirmation email for a non-renovated suite. Accurate photos were posted online and the suite you were assigned matches those images. Your booking was made through our website on June 13. One month later on July 17, we began selling our renovated rooms online when our new website went live. Unfortunately, when you inquired about renovated rooms at check in, they were sold out as we have a very limited number of them at this time.

Summary: The hotel was close to the entrance, but just as close as the Best Western plus Anaheim Inn we stayed at in January of 2018. We chose this hotel for the family suite, and we shouldn‚Äôt have. We saw that it was being remodeled by September 2019. There were pics of remodeled family suites, so by visiting mid September, we thought there would be a good chance of a newer room. However we got an old, outdated room. Everything was old. When we asked if we could move to a newer room, they said we requested an old room. This is where it went downhill. No one could help us. They said we wanted an old room. Who would request an old room? And we booked on the Camelot direct site, which doesn‚Äôt let you select new or old room. family suite was the only ‚Äúselection‚Äù we made. They said they
Manager Response: Kayleigh and Krystyn, As we previously explained, our renovated rooms were not available to book online at the time your reservation was made and you received a confirmation email for a non-renovated suite. Accurate photos were posted online and the suite you were assigned matches those images. Your booking was made through our website on June 13. One month later on July 17, we began selling our renovated rooms online when our new website went live. Unfortunately, when you inquired about renovated rooms at check in, they were sold out as we have a very limited number of them at this time.

Summary: Apparently the Camelot saves their renovated rooms only if you purchase on their site.... but they DO NOT disclose this, nor do the other sites.  Booked through Expedia MONTHS ago, only to find that we get one of the dated unrenovated rooms just because we booked on expedia.  No rooms available to even move to.  The girl on the phone was rude and unhelpful. Camelot... that is just poor business practices.  We will not book again.
Manager Response: Hi KP, The room images shown on the 3rd party site accurately match the room you booked. As our team member mentioned, we currently have a very limited number of renovated rooms which are being sold exclusively through our website. Again, if you'd like to upgrade to a newly renovated room, please call the hotel to check availability. A minimal upgrade fee will apply.

Summary Heading: Sewage Spewing from our bathtub drain! Managers are incredibly rude!
Summary: Disgusting!! The only thing worse then the sewage spewing out of our bathtub was the attitude of the Assistant Manager. The GM would not return multiple requests to discuss the matter.  We spent an hour from 1 pm to 12 am dealing with this issue on the last night of a three day trip to Disney Land. Even after it was cleaned the smell permeated the room. Earlier in the day our toilet clogged and our sink stopped draining which required the staff to come out and work on our room.  Our family was offered $25 for the inconvenience which we did not accept.
Manager Response: Hi James, We apologize for the inconvenience the clogged tub caused. Our staff worked diligently and assisted in a timely manner. Upon being made aware of the problem, our front desk team member gave you the option to move to another room but it was declined. Thus, we are happy to hear our maintenance staff resolved the issue within the hour. As requested, our front office manager kindly followed up with you the following morning.

Summary Heading: Basic hotel but has all you need
Summary: We were looking for a very basic hotel near Disneyland trying to get the most bang for our buck.  It is a motel Style with 4 floors all facing the parking lot. It's a bit older but the rooms were well maintained. All of the Linens were clean, room vacuumed wiped down Etc. No problems with cleanliness. The Pool isn't a full size pool and doesn't have any toys or slides which would have been nice, even just a couple pool noodles or balls (hint hint hotel).  The beds were comfy  and there was adequate air conditioning ,  though it's a bit noisy if you're sensitive to that. It didn't bother us. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear syke930, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate your compliments on our well-maintained rooms, and we look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth.

Summary: We stayed here for our honeymoon. Location was just opposite the entrance to Disneyland and there was a McDonald's right next door if you got peckish at any time of night!!! Rooms were big and we stayed in a newly refurbished room which was beautiful! Would highly recommend....lovely staff, clean hotel! Couldn't fault it!
Manager Response: Dear Laura E, Thank you for your outstanding review. Congratulations on your marriage and we're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: We loved our stay at this hotel. I stayed with my 10 year old son and we were there to visit Disneyland - which is literally 5 mins walk from the hotel. There are lots of great cafes along the road (we spent a lot of time at Denny's - great for breakfast). We were able to come back to the hotel each afternoon for a rest break because it was so close to the resort. We found our room to be very quiet and clean. It was also quite large. The pool is excellent. And there is a great little souvenir shop at the hotel which is great too. We were staying at a very busy/peak time - but found the staff to be really helpful and friendly. We will definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Paris_Loving_Kiwi, We are delighted that our ideal location, comfortable rooms, and helpful team members helped make your stay a memorable one. Having you as our guest was a pleasure and we very much look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is a very convenient location and good rooms however consider staying somewhere else. The staff is very rude and unaccomodating. This makes for an unpleasant stay. You have so many other options where customers matter and will bend over backwards to make you happy! Try the Candy cane Inn or Grand Legacy. Very nice staff.
Manager Response: Dear Disneylandprincess, We are disappointed to read your review as guest satisfaction is of high importance to us, exemplified by our many complementary Trip Advisor reviews. The review is vague and we'd like to discuss your experience in detail. Please call the Sales Department at 714-635-7275. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Large clean rooms, easy walk to Disney
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the size of the room.  Lots of large counter space to set things.  Room was very clean and always well cleaned.  McDonalds next door works well for quick, low cost breakfast.  You can also grab fruit, snacks, drinks from the Cove on the other side of the hotel at the Tropicana.  Pool isn‚Äôt the greatest, quite small and very salty water!  Some nice umbrellas and simple furniture would make a huge difference.  All in all though decent value for the area
Manager Response: Dear Krista N, Thank you for your feedback. It's great to hear your family enjoyed your accommodations. We are working on ordering new pool furniture and look forward to hearing your thoughts during your next visit. Take care!

Summary: Being able to skip on renting a vehicle and simply walk to Disneyland saved us hundreds of dollars. The staff were friendly and room comfortable. Hotel rooms were clean and a great place for us to relax and rest. Did not spend too much time at the property but it served its purpose. Close enough to hear, and see, the park fireworks - keep that in mind if you are trying to put little ones to sleep. Motel-type entry and windows do open to the main walkway.
Manager Response: Dear rldoubleu, Thanks for the great feedback! We're delighted you appreciated the convenience of our location and the Disney fireworks view from right outside your room. We hope to see you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: We stayed here due to its proximity to Disneyland and its affordability and it did not disappoint. The rooms were spacious and the staff were super friendly, we would definitely stay again. The parking charge could be reduced for those staying in the hotel instead of being the same as the daily parking rate for all visitors.
Manager Response: Dear nightshade1107,  We are delighted your family appreciated our convenient location and spacious rooms. The parking rate for hotel guests is $15.00 per day, whereas day parking for non-guests (when available) is $20.00. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Giving Disney Resorts a run for their money!
Summary: What a surprise to arrive at midnight and be treated to a brand new renovated family suite.  Beautifully completed and instantly comfortable, the Camelot group did a wonderful job.  Renovations are completed to a level of finishing you would find at the Grand.  Plush carpeting is a plus and a rarity in today‚Äôs hotel market.  Our son, who is autistic, instantly gravitated to the ceiling high head boards and made himself right at home.  Our birthday bash is off to a great start thanks to this wonderful (and affordable) room.
Manager Response: Dear NewlywedsOnTheGo, Thank you for providing excellent feedback regarding our newly renovated rooms. We are delighted that your family appreciated the finishes and special details. Enjoy your birthday celebrations!

Summary Heading: Great location, large rooms, beds not great
Summary: We stayed here for 10 days at the end of April/beginning of May. The exterior is charming. The front desk staff were fine, not overtly friendly, but they got us checked in quickly.   We opted for a family suite. It was huge. We had more than enough room for four people. Plenty of storage. The kitchenette and table were awesome! Hands down the best way to stay!   We enjoyed our stay here, overall. The room was always very clean when we came back and it was mostly very quiet. We stayed during construction so it was surprisingly how little it actually affected us. When we did see construction staff they were super polite.   The concierge was awesome. Because of construction we had to have our car parked and retrieved each time we left. They did a great job and even offered tips for
Manager Response: Dear ajbrownies,  Thank you for taking the time to write your detailed review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and appreciated our location. We are excited to share there will be many exciting upgrades to come and we hope you get to experience one of our newly renovated rooms during your next visit.

Summary: 5 adults stayed in the family suite.  Staff was courteous and friendly and the location can‚Äôt be beat!  The suite was a great option for us but we could have used another bathroom - or at least a half bath!  Hotel is a bit tired and the pool needs some major sprucing up.
Manager Response: Dear Celeverse, We appreciate your feedback and we're happy to share we are in the process of renovating our property. The project should be complete in the fall. We look forward to hearing your thoughts on our updated guest rooms during your next visit.

Summary: The lobby of this hotel is very nice, and the valet greets you when you arrive. We booked the family suite and it was HUGE! It's true that the room could be updated a bit, but there was a pullout sofa sleeper and King bed in the first room along with a dining table and kitchenette, and there were two queen beds in the 2nd bedroom along with the bathroom. The sheer amount of space was such a wonderful thing, especially with a 16-month old in our midst. It also allowed for all of our suitcases to have a place to go without us tripping all over each other. The hotel was walking distance to the park and there was a laundry facility and scooter/stroller rental place on site. There is also a sundry store open from 8 a.m. - 10 p.m. The affordability for the space and location cannot be
Manager Response: Dear Siren6214, Thank you for writing a great review. It is wonderful to learn that our spacious Family Suite and convenient location helped make your visit a memorable one. Also, we are excited to share with you that we are in the process of renovating all guest rooms. The project should be complete by the fall and we'd love to hear your feedback during your next stay!

Summary: This hotel is well-located.  We were easily able to walk back and forth from Disneyland without a problem.  It is also located close to Panera and McDonalds if you want to eat before or after you enter the park.  There is a little gift shop on-site.  The hotel itself was good.  Simple and clean.  We had the King Suite (see photos) for 2 couples. It worked ok.   The only thing that this hotel could improve upon is its customer service.  A couple of the employees were reluctant to be helpful. But it was still overall perfectly adequate.   I have enclosed pics to show our room and the view from our door.
Manager Response: Dear amychav, We are happy to learn you enjoyed our convenient location and comfortable accommodations. Our guests have the ability to view Disneyland's famous Matterhorn Bobsleds and fireworks show from the landing outside of their rooms. Thank you for providing great feedback.

Summary: Great location almost directly across from Disneyland main entrance. Reasonably priced, decent rooms,could use some updates but not bad. Service was good and our only complaint would be the construction that was going on next door at 7am! It literally vibrated the entire building. Front desk said they were inquiring into it and we didnt have the problem again. You also have a pretty good view of the fireworks at Disneyland from the walkway in front of your door!
Manager Response: Dear Speedracer61, We greatly appreciate your review. Thank you for your compliments regarding our convenient location and helpful front desk staff. We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Adequate and walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: I visited with my son and granddaughter to go to Disneyland for the first time. It's very convenient because it's pretty much right across the street from Disneyland so you can walk from the hotel. The room was nothing special with adequate with two full beds brought up a crib for the baby right away. The small refrigerator for some reason was not working when we got there and we put the baby's milk in there and it went bad other than that the people were very nice. The man in the scooter rental office even inflated the tires on the baby's carriage for us cuz they were flat.
Manager Response: Dear btrflybabe215, Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that our helpful team members and great location helped make your family's stay memorable. We are sorry to hear your mini refrigerator wasn't working. Sometimes the temperature dial inadvertently gets turned down; however, our maintenance staff would have been happy to fix or replace it if there was an issue with it. Thanks again for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Comfortable but time for a face lift
Summary: Pro's:  AWESOME location, very large rooms, clean, plenty of towels supplied Con's: flat pillows, dated decor throughout, really don't like that the bathroom sink area is outside of the bathroom and has no privacy, no assistance with luggage, no desk area/work station in the room, no modern charging stations or amenities in the rooms, the pool was not heated, no gym
Manager Response: Dear PCJ_1998, We are excited to share that we are beginning room renovations in about a month or so. Lots of great updates are in the works and we hope to welcome you back once the project is complete. Thank you for your review.

Summary: The Camelot Inn surprised me.  I thought it would be old and dirty, but that was certainly not the case.  I had a two queen bed room with a fabulous view of the fireworks at Disneyland.  I didn't book a fireworks facing room, but they were nice enough to give me one.  The room was very clean, freshly painted, had a decent bathroom with a tub/shower.  The swimming pool was a bit chilly in January, but the hot tub was perfect.  They have valet and security.  The room has a two cup coffee maker, fridge and microwave.  The fridge didn't get very cold, so I put milk in the ice bucket.  I am delighted that its 1 block to the entrance to Disneyland.  Last year I stayed at Paradise Pier and the walk was three times as long to the entry gate.
Manager Response: Dear charlottepA6595LU, We're happy to hear you found our hotel to be of good value. Your feedback regarding our comfortable rooms and ideal location is greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again next year!

Summary: My son and his wife booked this place for several days while we visited Disneyland with our two young granddaughters...The place was clean and very nice! It was in an ideal location where we only had a few minutes walk to the entrance to Disneyland...
Manager Response: Dear Sadie B, Thank you for your compliments regarding your accommodations. We are glad to hear your family's stay was memorable and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We arrived late in the evening and the clerk was very friendly and helpful.  Our room was clean, beds comfortable and for 4 of us it wasn‚Äôt too crowded.  It‚Äôs a close 10 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland and California Adventure.  It‚Äôs also next to McDonalds which was convenient for a quick breakfast.  Parking is pretty full but we were able to find a space pretty close to our room.  They also have valet if you want to go that route.  Our flight home wasn‚Äôt until later in the evening but the hotel had space to hold our bags until we were ready to leave, the service was free but we were sure to tip them.  I would recommend this as a great place to stay for any trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear lanafana, We appreciate your great review. Having you as our guest was a pleasure, and we look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth!"

Summary: This hotel is perfect for a close to Disneyland Resort base. We did a whirlwind trip on the weekend to visit Christmas at Disney so we were not at are room much. But it was fine for what we needed a place to sleep at the end of a busy day. The hotel room was clean and had everything we needed but is a little dated and could use a refreshing.
Manager Response: Dear behr2017, We're glad you were happy with your accommodations and close proximity to Disneyland. Your thoughtful feedback is very much appreciated. Hope to see you again in 2019!

Summary: We had a great stay at your hotel.  We had the family suite which was perfect with a perfect view of the fireworks at night.  Nice clean rooms with fairly comfortable beds.  Staff was nice and friendly and the staff at One Stop Mobility was great with our scooter and stroller.  It could use some updates, like a fan in the bathroom but other than that a great place and location to stay.
Manager Response: Dear dpalmer168, We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the family suite and fireworks view from our property. Your feedback is important to us and we are excited to share room renovations will begin next year. See you next time!

Summary: Hotel is very nice and the location has easy access to plenty of places to eat and to the park.  The rooms are nice, beds are comfortable and the staff is courteous.  The nightly fireworks show can be seen from the rooftop pool.
Manager Response: We're glad you were happy with your accommodations and close proximity to Disneyland. Your thoughtful feedback is very much appreciated. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, rooms a bit worn but clean
Summary: We stayed in the two bedroom suite as we were traveling with our adult daughter and her friend.  We had a king bed in our room with a kitchen style sink, mini fridge and small dining table. 2nd room had two queen beds.  Bathroom (there is only one) was in room with 2 beds.  Our beds were comfortable, but rooms are dated, kitchen sink leaked and made banging noises when water was turned on.     Best part of this place was the convenience of being able to walk to Disneyland.  It is about 3/10 of a mile walk to the park entrance.  I found the front desk staff to be friendly and considerate. There is a daily parking fee if you have your car with you.  I think it was approximately $17.00 per day. If self parking spaces were not available they would valet park it for you at same rate.
Manager Response: Dear bilzbabe, Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly team members and our property's close proximity to Disneyland. Room renovations are scheduled to begin in early 2019. We hope to see you again next year.

Summary Heading: Worst Hotel in the past 5 years
Summary: What a piece of junk hotel scam this place is. Rude front desk, Undisclosed construction on the entire side of the hotel, barebones room, dirty carpet, rock hard bed, super basic TV options, dirty pool deck. We unplugged the lights from the outlets because they were so old and loose we feared they would start a fire.  Literally the only reason to stay here is the proximity to Disneyland. So not worth the cost and they tag on a $35 parking fee as well, or resort fee - whatever they call it, the whole thing should be called a robbery.
Manager Response: Dear jarbaggle89, Thank you for your feedback; however, we are surprised by the comments in your review. Our comfortable rooms and helpful team members tend to stand out to our guests, as mentioned in our numerous positive Trip Advisor reviews. We'd also like to clarify that the side of the hotel was being painted; no construction was involved. The daily parking fee is $15.00 plus tax and there is no resort fee.

Summary: We enjoyed staying here. The family suites are so large and spacious and with the couch bed we were able to accommodate a last minute family member that decided to come. The kids really enjoyed being able to watch the fireworks from the balcony. I really have nothing bad to say about our stay. There is no breakfast included, but plenty of options close by. The walk to Disneyland is perfect. The sinks to the bathrooms are outside the bathroom which makes getting ready so much easier, and plenty of room to hold everything. If you want good lighting then you have to open the curtains because the lamps just wouldn‚Äôt cut it. I also love that they didn‚Äôt charge us to park unless we actually had a car. So many hotels just add that cost in to the total. I would totally stay here again,
Manager Response: Dear jolynnp533, We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay. It sounds like our spacious Family Suite was the perfect choice for your party. We are planning to renovate all guest rooms beginning in early 2019. Our military discount will continue to be offered. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future and hearing your thoughts on the updates.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a Disneyland vacation
Summary: This hotel is a great stay when at Disneyland Parks. Very close for walking to the parks, which is a must. The room was clean and spacious, if a little dated. The price is excellent for the quality of the hotel and the staff were helpful and friendly and accommodating. The pool area is great and you can watch the nightly fireworks at Disneyland from the hot tub, which is a great way to end a day.
Manager Response: Dear pixievixen, We are delighted you enjoyed the Disney fireworks view from our terrace level pool. Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay. We hope to see you again next year!

Summary: My wife and I previously stayed here in April and were appreciative of the location and price. When our son and daughter-in-law asked us to go with them and their three children to Disneyland. We quickly suggested staying at the Camelot.   This hotel is not as spiffy as some of the newer hotels, but the price and location are fantastic. The housekeeping staff do a fantastic job. My wife had misplaced some earings, searched high and low for them but couldn't find them.  Next day we found them on the headboard of the bed. Thank you housekeeping staff.  Front office staff are courteous and efficient. Thank you.  We are looking forward to our next Disneyland trip and will definitely stay here  again.
Manager Response: Dear Brian B, Thank you for your great review. We are glad to hear you found our property to be of good value. Your comments are appreciated and we look forward to accommodating your family again in the future!

Summary Heading: Superb location, but facility needs some TLC
Summary: Torn between a three and four star review for this facility.  The location is perfect if you are in town for Disneyland.  The main gates are a short walk away.  The staff were all friendly.  Check in was efficient.  The pool was nice though a little small.  The biggest reason I can't rate the property better than "average" is the lack of soundproofing.  You can hear the rooms above and beside you and everything on the outer walkways.  I've seen it mentioned that the hotel is undergoing an upgrade next year, which will hopefully address this problem somewhat.  Given the location, and value, I would be willing to stay here again in the future post updates.
Manager Response: Dear Jake N, We appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. Our room renovations will begin in early 2019 and we hope to see you again once the project is complete.

Summary: This hotel was very close to Disneyland. We walked 2min to the corner and crossed the street. Walked 3min and we were at the main gate turn styles. So easy peasy. The downside to this hotel was that the free parking was very limited and if you couldn't find a free spot, you had to pay valet to park your car (in the same lot!). We didn't bother with their small breakfast (no where to sit and eat it anyway), we just went to Starbucks in downtown Disney. Overall the room was clean and satisfactory and the location was awesome for walking to the parks.
Manager Response: Hi Cassahfrass722, Based off your comments, we believe you may have reviewed the wrong hotel. Please feel free to call us at 714-635-7275 if you have any questions.

Summary Heading: This place is due for a makover.
Summary: This place is all about the location. If you don't mind the couch in you room being ripped or carpet that looks like its from the 70s you will be ok with this place. The front desk was nice and check in and out was a breeze but I will not go back until they do some updates. You cant beat the location across the street from Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Eatintheclaw, We have good news for you. Complete room renovations are set to begin in early 2019. We hope to see you again next year.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting disneyland
Summary: we had 5 adults and two kids while we were visiting Disneyland and the two bedroom suite was perfect. there was plenty of beds (3 and a pull out couch) and still room to put a crib(which they supplied), and to hang about the suite to relax.   the outdoor heated pool and hot tub were on the third floor and kind of above the parking lot which was pretty cool. it was also a great place to watch the fireworks from Disney. but be warned the fire works are loud from here even if you are in your room.  this hotel is right across the street from the park and it is just a less than ten minute walk to get to the front gate of the parks and downtown Disney.  I would definitely stay here again if we come back to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin C, We are happy to hear you took advantage of the fireworks view from our terrace level pool. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We hope to see you and your family again during your next visit to The Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: Clean and comfortable and very spacious family suite. Housekeeping kept things lovely and clean. Pool small but adequate and usual for the area. Super close location to Disneyland gates and close to Mimi‚Äôs Diner for affordable breakfast and dinner! Did have an issue with trying to obtain assistance from a front desk person - when asking about transport to local outlets was pushed to use a local driver who was obviously giving commissions for the referral but otherwise very good. Definitely recommend if you need bigger rooms and space for your family or group!!
Manager Response: Dear erin993, Thanks for the great feedback. In regards to transportation, we offer our guests the option of local car services, taxis, or we recommend Uber and Lyft  We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your family's next visit.

Summary: We've stayed here several times because of its proximity to Disneyland and nearby restaurants, and the availability of a two-bedroom suite that is great for our 3-generation family of six, including two small children. The service has always been good and we've had no problems. It's not fancy and is perhaps a bit outdated, but it's clean and convenient and the price is reasonable given its location.
Manager Response: Dear brandenburg456, We appreciate being your family's home away from home when visiting the Disney Parks. Thank you for your review. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was my 4th time staying at the Camelot.  We love the close proximity to Disneyland and have always enjoyed our stay.  I was a bit disappointed that between our last stay and this one that the complimentary continental breakfast was eliminated which we always enjoyed and it was a great benefit of the hotel.  Our room was exactly as we had expected but I did feel that there seemed to be a bit more wear and tear, a bit of peeling wallpaper.  I also would encourage a book of attractions, restaurants, pen and paper as there was no "information" to be had in the room.  Hair dryer was terrible, bring your own and I'd encourage a better premium coffee within the room.  All in all, I will continue to stay at the Camelot.  Rooms are always clean and comfortable and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee405398, We greatly appreciate your feedback. The continental breakfast was discontinued in 2012 in favor of offering healthier, reasonably priced items at the Cove on Harbor, located at our sister property next store, the Tropicana Inn & Suites. We are excited to share we will begin renovating all guest rooms in early 2019. It is wonderful to hear your stay was memorable and we look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to The Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: As all other reviews say the location can‚Äôt be beat. We stayed in a family  suite - really spacious for our family of 5. Having one bathroom made me a littler nervous but it was fine. I was super impressed by the quick check-in and the housekeeping was amazing. Daily and always done by 1pm. I stayed here 10 years ago  and we‚Äôll be back :)
Manager Response: Dear ExcitedforCuba789, Thank you for providing your thoughtful review. We are happy to learn that your family was satisfied with our comfortable rooms, convenient location and hardworking housekeeping staff. We hope to extend our hospitality to you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We‚Äôve stay in the Camelot on a number of occasions and the rooms and service from the staff have never disappointed. It‚Äôs a good hotel for families and couples wanting reasonable rates and a good location for Disneyland and a number of restaurants that cater for most tastes and budgets.
Manager Response: Dear brianlockwood, Thank you for taking the time to write your review. Having you as our guest is always a pleasure. We greatly appreciate being your home away from home when visiting the Happiest Place on Earth. See you next time!

Summary Heading: Location - location - location plus good value
Summary: We stayed here as a family from Australia for over a week each time - this year and ten years prior. The was large with a kitchette. The rooms are dated, however, the beds were comfortable and clean. The staff were excellent. The check in and out was easy and they allowed a car spot for us so we could spend extra time at Disneyland. The room only has one bathroom which is tricky with a family, however, the location and price is worth the slight hassel.
Manager Response: Hi Paula S, Your feedback regarding you recent stay is very much appreciated. We're happy to hear your family enjoyed your accommodations and we're excited to share that we are planning on renovating all guest rooms next year. Stay tuned for more details.

Summary: Stayed here recently. I think this hotel is really good-  1. friendly staff 2. Big Rooms 3. Excellent location- about 5-7 minute walk to the Parks 4. Quite a few restaurants around including a McDonalds just opposite  We used to get to the park every morning by 8:30am and come back at about 2pm to rest after a busy morning and again walk to the park at 5pm  The only problem is the car park is a bit tight and can be difficult to find a parking space- but fear not- they do Valet parking for no extra charge!!  Would definitely stay here again when I visit Disneyland again next year.
Manager Response: Dear Anaes20,  Thank you for mentioning our comfortable rooms, friendly staff, and ideal location in your review. We appreciate your comments and we are delighted your family's stay was memorable. See you next year!

Summary Heading: Good deal for a hotel close to Disney
Summary: We stayed 4 nights in a family suite with 2 queens and a king and pull out bed. We had 3 adults and 3 small kids. The room was dated but the beds were comfortable and clean with decent linens. Check out and in was easy and they held our bags for us on check out day so we could spend extra time at the park before our flight out. They had a small saltwater pool on the 4th floor (where we stayed) and we could see the fireworks out of the room window or on the walkway just outside our room. I did wish there was more than one bathroom in the room but other than that it was totally adequate and met our needs well.  It‚Äôs a great deal for a hotel so close to Disneyland and with 2 rooms together for a bigger family.
Manager Response: Dear snowflake170, We are delighted to hear you found our property to be of good value, and we appreciate your positive comments regarding our ideal location and spacious family suite. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed with the family.  Was within walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Check in was fast, we asked for a late check out and they let us check out at noon which was great.  The pool is not huge and it is only 3.5 feet deep but it was cool and refreshing which is perfect.  We stayed in a family suite and it was spacious.
Manager Response: Dear Erika J, Your 5 star review is very much appreciated. We're glad you took advantage of our tranquil pool during these warm summer days and that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland. Having you as our guest was a pleasure and we look forward to meeting again.

Summary Heading: Don‚Äôt count on your room being ready until early evening
Summary: My sister and I stayed here over the weekend. Our stay didn‚Äôt get off to the best start we arrived at 12:00 and our room wasn‚Äôt ready which is more then okay so we took that time to have a little look around. We came back at 2:00 ( switch is the general check in time for every hotel/ motel I have ever been too) and it still wasn‚Äôt ready. Come 4:00 our room was finally ready. The accomodation was clean and tidy, pool area very lacking though, and it‚Äôs extremely convenient just across the road from Disneyland. Come Sunday we had house keeping arrive at 10:30 to clean our room we told them come back in half an hour as we will be going to the park then. We arrived back at 3:30 and our room hadn‚Äôt been cleaned what so ever, no wonder our room took forever to be ready the first day.
Manager Response: Dear shaniajackson, Standard hotel check in time is 4:00 pm and all guest rooms are guaranteed to be ready at that time. The hotel provides complimentary luggage storage for guests arriving early. For reference, our check in policy is listed on confirmation emails and the website's Policies Page. We are delighted to hear you and your sister enjoyed your accommodations and close proximity to Disneyland. Hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for five days. Arranged transport from the airport through the hotel website. Only waited for ten minutes upon arrival, to be taken right to the door. Check in was easy and he staff were friendly. We had a room on the second floor. Spotlessly clean with two very comfortable queen beds. The towels were more than expected, and changed daily. I can not fault the housekeeping staff, excellent! Loved the fridge in the room. The room was mostly quiet other than small children‚Äôs excited voices in the morning as they ran past the door. Surely this is to be expected? As advertised, there‚Äôs a great view of the nighttime fireworks. The location is really convenient to Disneyland and many restaurants. The local shop in the Tropicana is vastly overpriced, there again it is
Manager Response: Dear muttley56uk, We appreciate your detailed review and we're happy you enjoyed our property's fireworks view and comfortable rooms. Thank you for choosing the Camelot Inn & Suites for your family's Disney vacation.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland, two minute walk. Check in was very fast, and the girl at the desk was very helpful and friendly . The rooms are adequate and clean. There is a very small pool on the roof. We had no problems here at all and our room looked at the fireworks.
Manager Response: Hi dm670, Thank you for your feedback regarding our helpful team members and ideal location. We appreciate your review and hope to see you again when you return to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located right across Disneyland; parked the car here and walked to Disneyland.  Also surrounded by restaurants and shops, no need to go far.  Will come back, highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear 24Ceecee, Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We hope your family created many magical memories during your stay and we look forward to seeing you again next time.

Summary: We've just returned from a 7 night stay in Anaheim staying at Camelot Inn and Suites and I can't rate them highly enough.   There we're 5 of us on this trip, 3 adults and 2 children.  We had a king bed in the living room and 2 queens in the bedroom.  Everything went smoohtlessly and check-in and check-out was effortless and easy.  The staff were great, very friendly and accommodating.    Rooms were made up impecably daily with plenty of clean towels left for us.  The beds were actually incredibly comfortable which I've never had in a hotel before.  One of our roommates is a MAJOR snorer and with the door closed between the 2 rooms, this could not be heard at all.  A very easy walk to Disneyland and right next door to McDonald's and other eating establishments are very nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Katstar_nz,  We appreciate your great review. Thank you for highlighting the spaciousness of our Family Suite and our staff's friendly demeanor. We hope your family created many magical memories during your visit to "The Happiest Place on Earth."    It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Best location and good room.  Only issue is the wifi can be iffy or else a 5 star rating.  One piece of advice - next door is a mini-mart - the cove.  It has a great beer selection and one of the best coffees in the area.  Certainly better than you can get in the parks.  Wish we had found it for our first morning breakfast and coffee.
Manager Response: Hi Steve L, We're very happy you enjoyed your recent visit and we appreciate your feedback. The Cove on Harbor (located at our sister property the Tropicana Inn & Suites) is a great place to stop for coffee and breakfast on the way to the parks. See you next time!

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance to the front gates of Disney and perfect for us as we were there for one night only.  The hotel and rooms are outdated and could use a little bit of renovations. The drawers on the chest of drawers kept rolling out and I was worried about one of us tripping over at night.  Great location ok room.
Manager Response: Dear Jabri, It's great to hear your family enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland. We appreciate your review and we're excited to share that we will be renovating all guest rooms beginning in early 2019.
