Will definitely stay here again and recommend to everyone I know who takes a trip out that way.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are delighted to have been a part of the magical memories you and your family created during your visit. See you next time!

Summary: This was a very nice hotel and very convenient to walking to Disneyland.  It is the "old school" outdoor entrance to your hotel room, but most of the hotels are like that in the area, because of the time they were built.  The rooms were very clean and the staff seemed very friendly.  We got the Family Suite, so if there was only one complaint, was that the single bathroom was in the kids half of the room, which made it difficult to get ready with 1 male and 3 females.  We could watch the Disneyland fireworks from the balcony, when we were not at the park.  Also, plenty of restaurants walking distance from the hotel, so we didn't have to eat every meal at the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience. It is great to hear that you were happy with our hospitality and enjoyed the convenience our location. We hope that you created long lasting memories to cherish for years to come while visiting the "Happiest Place on Earth!"

Summary: We stayed here for our first trip to Disneyland. We stayed in a suite on the 5th floor and were able to see the fireworks from our balcony (be sure to see at least one show at Disney, though). The staff were courteous and helpful and the road noise was masked easily by running the fan. The only reason we didn't rate it as "excellent" was because the room could use some updates...low water pressure for the shower, some molding was stripping, and the water smelled and tasted bad. Had to pay for parking, $12 per night. The hotel is a .25 mile walk from the Disneyland gates. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate that you mentioned our spacious rooms, friendly customer service, and of course our proximity to Disneyland. We are excited to announce that we are planning to renovate our rooms next year...stay tuned!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel Next To Entrance To Disney!!!
Summary: Loved this Hotel! Booked it on the Disney website through a package and we were so happy with it. It is so close to the entrance to Disneyland! Hotel is cute and room was clean, staff was very friendly and accommodating. Close to the hotel are lots of places to eat and a market so you could buy breakfast snacks for taking a break from eating in the park. Overall a great hotel. Loved it and loved Disneyland!!!
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated. Thank you for mentioning our convenient location to both Disney parks. We are glad you took advantage of the Cove on Harbor Mini Market and Coffee House located at our sister property, the Tropicana Inn & Suites. We look forward to extending our hospitality to you on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: One of the better hotels directly across from Disneyland.
Summary: I have stayed at many of the hotels on the "hotel row" right across from Disney.  This was one of the cleaner and more comfortable places I have stayed.  Parking can e limited.  No breakfast is included, which for some of the places on this strip is orange drink, bad coffee and stale danishes.  McDonalds is next door and next to that is Panera, both good options.  The walkways on any floor allow for good viewing of the nightly fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you took advantage of the great view of Disney's famous firework display from our property. Hope to see you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: We recently stayed in a suite,  and it was WONDERFUL! We had 5 adults and 1 child in our party. The separate bedroom gave privacy at the end of a long day at the park. There was plenty of room for everyone, and the beds were comfortable.  The swimming pool was nice, and we saw the fireworks from our room at night! The room was clean and plenty of towels. We will definitely stay here again! Oh, and it's right across the street from Disneyland! :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your most recent experience while staying at the Camelot Inn & Suites.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your Family Suite and took advantage of the fantastic view of the fireworks from our 4th floor pool.  We look forward to extending our hospitality to you again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.

Summary: I booked here because I was staying with my cousin and her dance group. I probably wouldn't have booked here if it wasn't for that reason. In saying that it had some really great qualities about it. 1. Was clean and comfortable rooms and beds. 2. Had a fridge to get supplies. 3. Right next door to a 24 hour Maccas, good for breakfast. 4. Very close walk to the entrance of Disneyland. 5. Had ice machines on every level. 6. Had an onsite coin laundry. 7. great place to watch the Disneyland fireworks from the pool area. 8. lots of restaurants in walking distance. 9. PVS Pharmacy convenience store and Liquor Store within walking distance and sells alcohol until 2am. The pool area was OK, we spent a bit of time down there having drinks. I guess a few things that were not so great,
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated. Thank you for sharing your positive experience and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed in the family suite at christmas time to enjoy 4 days at Disneyland/California Adventure . We stayed in the family suite which fit 8 of us comfortably.  The room was well kept and was pretty quiet. It was nice to a have a fridge and microwave . we like to have lunch in our room while taking a break from the parks.  The pool was small and on a second level balcony but it did the job. The breakfast only consisted of some small pastries and juices.   The best part was the location. Literally 5 minutes walking distance to the park entrances. This is a very big deal with traveling with small children. Many restraunts in the vicinity.   Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are very happy that your family enjoyed the many conveniences we offer. We hope you were able to take advantage of the fireworks view from our terrace level pool. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Camelot...hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Couldn't be more pleased with my stay at the Anaheim Camelot Inn. The location was perfect, 5 minute walk to Disneyland and we could see the Disneyland fireworks from the balcony every night! The rooms were very spacious and clean, I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice affordable stay next to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience! The fireworks view from our property can't be beat. We look forward to extending our hospitality to you again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.

Summary: We needed a place to stay after staying all day at Disneyland. This room was an average room but clean which is all that we needed. The wifi didn't work. The parking was horrible even with valet. but again we just wanted a clean room, which at the time was good enough for me.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You stay at the Camelot Inn and Suites because of the location!! Nothing better after a long day at the park with the kids than walking across the street and being at your hotel!!  Pros: For a family of five, the double room was extremely spacious. Two beds in the room, King bed and pull out bed in the living room. TV and mini fridge in each of the rooms. Small sink in the main room and then one outside the bathroom in the second room.  Pool is small but does the trick. Most excellent view for the fireworks.  McDonalds right next door for my morning coffee!  Beds were comfortable enough.  Cons: Parking is tight and costs $12 per day. Mind you, valet parking is included in this if needed.  No coffee in the lobby and the stuff provided in the room is sub-par. Time for individual
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience on your most recent visit to the Camelot Inn & Suites. It sounds like our spacious family Suite was the perfect choice for your family of 5. We are delighted that you took advantage of our location and superb fireworks view form the terrace level pool. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: amazing location a little noisy with some service issues
Summary: I will start with the bad, we came back to the hotel ar around one pm for our baby to get some sleep. we put up the privacy sign at the door. ay two, we got a call asking us if we want our room cleaned which of course ruined baby's sleep. This is so irregular (calling to see if we meant privacy???). Furthermore, when we left (removing the pricy sign) and returned 4 or 5 hours later the room was not cleaned. when we mentioned this at the front desk they didnt really seem to care.  On the good side the hotel is just across the street from disney making it really easy to simply walk there (no need for a car or shuttle or anything). from our roo  on the fifth floor we had a perfect view of the fireworks.  the room is a little noisy though. you can hear the fireworks really loud e
Manager Response: Due to the privacy sign on your door and your conversation with the Front Desk, our Housekeeping staff honored your verbal request for no service. We appreciate your feedback, and we are very happy to hear that your family enjoyed our spacious Family Suite in addition to our close proximity to Disneyland. Thank you for choosing the Camelot Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: A great, economical option, for your visit to Disneyland
Summary: My extended family stayed at the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites over the Christmas holidays. The rooms were clean, and very conveniently located to the Disneyland and California Adventure. We were able to walk over to the parks each day, and could be in the gates within 15 minutes of leaving the hotel.  There is not a breakfast offered at the hotel, but each morning my kids would head over to McDonald's just next door with the grandparents and grab a quick breakfast.   The close proximity allowed any folks that wanted to return to the hotel mid-afternoon the ability to do so easily.  Also, the walk at the end of a long day in the parks wasn't too bad either.  In the evening, we could see the fireworks over Disneyland Park from just outside our room (or if we got in the right
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your most recent visit with us.  As mentioned, our guests are able to walk outside each room and view Disney's famous firework extravaganza from the corridor and also the 4th- floor pool and gazebo area.  In addition to McDonald's we hope you took advantage of the delicious breakfast croissant at the Pizza Press located on the opposite side of the hotel.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Disneyland area.  We appreciate you and thank you again for recommending us to your friend.

Summary: Room was clean and in the perfect location to visit Disneyland and California adventure.  Good hotel reasonably priced would stay here again. The rooms were a good size and provided the usual services expected
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  Thank you for sharing your positive experience and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at this property several times now and in fact I just made a new reservation for the upcoming weekend.  We really appreciate the location being so close to the entrance of the parks (very easy walk) and the hotel is very comfortable as well.  The rooms have always been clean and the staff has always been very friendly and helpful.  This is the only place we stay now when we visit Disneyland once or twice each year.   It is so nice to be able to park the car and walk to the parks and Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: We thank you for being a loyal guest and appreciate your feedback.  It is always a pleasure extending our hospitality to returning guests and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth".

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel. The beds are comfortable and the deluxe family suites have a lot of space. The walk to the parks is less than 10 mins. Super easy, the staff is great. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: We are happy that you enjoyed your stay during your most recent visit to the Disneyland area.  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Upon arrival at the hotel I was greeted by a lovely bubbly girl who checked me quickly and efficiently. The foyer was cute and friendly. The lass checking me in explained a few things about the hotel and the WiFi in the room which many hotel staff tend to overlook these days.  The room was a generous size. The beds really comfortable. The room has a coffee machine, mini fridge and microwave.  This is a basic but comfortable hotel.  There is a laundry, each floor has ice machines and a drink vending machine. There were 2 lifts. Quite a lot of parking. Roof top pool area.  You can also hire electric scooters from this hotel. The kind people require if they are unable to walk long distances.  The hotel is really well located. A short 10 minute walk from the hotel to the entrance of
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your positive review.  For items such as milk, cheese, cereal, medicine, etc., the Cove on Harbor Mini Market is also just two doors down the street for your convenience.  We look very much forward to extending our hospitality to you again on your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth".

Summary: A+ service from really nice people will keep me coming back to Camelot Inn. The room is fine, nothing special but not bad at all especially for the price. Very convenient to get to Disneyland and a lot of places to eat (love the pizza place right next door!). Great view of the fireworks from right outside our door (hint...get a third floor room if possible for best view of fireworks). Yep, we'll be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and we are delighted that you will be back to visit us again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.   Hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is perfectly located for close and easy access to Disneyland and California Adventure park. It is at most a 10 minute walk. Maybe slightly longer if you have prams and children. This hotel is also very reasonably priced.  The rooms are well maintained and the service is fantastic. The bathroom is a little small, but that wasn't a big deal for us. It is also in close proximity to a lot of car rental companies. We didn't have a car with us, but I did see a sign out the front which said $12 per day for parking. If you are staying here you do not need a car to access the parks.  Lastly, you are right next door to McDonald's should you need a late night/ early morning snack or coffee. The coffee from McDonald's was better than the cafe at Palm Cove (which is on the other
Manager Response: Dear Yvette S,  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Camelot Inn & Suites and thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback.  We hope you were able to enjoy the famous Disneyland firework display one evening while relaxing in our pool locate on the 4th level of the hotel.  We look forward to extending our hospitality to you again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.

Summary: We've stayed at several of the hotels located across from Disneyland and this is our favorite. We love the two bedroom suites. Both have a fridge. We also had a microwave and sink. Super convenient when spending a week or so.   We were super comfortable here and love being so close to the park. I doubt we'll ever stay anywhere else when going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience. It is great to hear that you were happy with our hospitality and enjoyed all the conveniences that the Camelot Inn & Suites offers. We sincerely hope that you created long lasting memories to cherish for years to come while visiting the "Happiest Place on Earth". See you next time!

Summary: This hotel has the perfect location. We watched the nightly firework show from our balcony. It was an easy walk across the street from the park.  Parking was a nightmare. The rooms were clean and adequate for our needs.
Manager Response: We are glad your family took advantage of the great view of Disney's famous firework display from our property. When we are running at 100% occupancy, parking can be tight; however, complimentary on-site valet is included in the daily parking fee.  Your feedback is appreciated. Hope to see you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: A great hotel for our Disney trip. Staff were very helpful, rooms clean and comfortable and so close to Disneyland only 5 minute walk. We had a family room which was very large for our family of 6 and we could watch the fireworks from our hotel room if we weren't in the park itself. There were ample resturants close by to chose from. The hotel is an excellent choice for the price, I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed our spacious and comfortable Family Suite during your most recent visit. Your positive review is much appreciated. See you next time!

Summary: We stayed at this accommodation for 7 nights in April 2016 and we had no problems at all.  The staff were polite and helpful, the cleanliness of the room was good even while the d√©cor was a little dated.  We were on the 4th floor, so close to the pool and the fireworks from Disney were easy viewing every night (as promised).  We had a great time and Disney was a short 10 minute walk and food was so close too. The hot tub was HOT but I am not sure if the pool was heated, it was not freezing.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback. We are delighted that you appreciated our proximity to the Disney Parks. In fact, we are just 600 steps away from the Main Entrance and we offer a fantastic view of Disney's famous firework display from our terrace level pool.   We are excited to share that we are planning a renovation to begin by the end of this year. Stay tuned!

Summary: This hotel will now be our ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù hotel for trips to Disneyland. It‚Äôs only a few minutes from Disnelyand entrance, close enough to go back to the room during the day for a break. We had a 2 room family suite that had 2 queens in one room, 1 king & a pull out couch in the other. The room also had a dining table for 4 people & a small wet bar area, with a microwave & mini frige. Both sleeping areas had a TV, frige and separate AC units. Our room (316) was 1 floor below the pool & we did not hear much pool noise. Only 1 night of our stay did we here any loud footsteps above us. The room itself was comfortable for 4 adults & 2 children (one in a pack-n-play)  with extra space to play/relax without triping over eachother.   There is a small gift/snack shop attached to the hotel &
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review. Your valuable feedback is much appreciated. It sounds like our spacious Family Suite was the perfect choice for your family. We're very happy you found our beds comfortable. A good night's sleep can make all the difference when spending several hours a day enjoying the Disney Parks. We look very much forward to extending our hospitality to you on your next visit. See you soon!

Summary: Had a nice stay here this week. Rooms were clean, comfortable and spacious, but nothing fancy. Very short walk over to the Disneyland turnstiles (approx 5 minutes), and we could see the nightly fireworks show from our balcony.  Lots of inexpensive family restaurants within a two minute walk of this location. Would definitely recommend and will stay here again.
Manager Response: We are very happy that your family enjoyed the many conveniences we offer. We hope you were able to take advantage of the fireworks view from our terrace level pool. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Camelot...hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for the first time with my son this week. It was a very pleasant stay. Nothing fancy, but clean, comfortable rooms, comfortable beds and easy walking distance (3 hotels from main crosswalk) to main entrance to Disneyland. Not sure why previous posters complained about parking prices. It's only around $12 per night, valet at no extra charge (obviously a tip would be appreciated). Thats cheap. However, if you want a pool, this one is about the size of a postage stamp. The online pics are somewhat deceiving. But, overall, I'd stay here again in a heartbeat. Great location, and awesome, friendly, helpful staff.
Manager Response: Due to the location of our pool on the 4th floor terrace, it is 3.5 feet deep and offers a fantastic view of the Matterhorn and Disney's famous firework display. We are delighted to hear you and your son enjoyed the convenience of our ideal location. Our team members strive to make each and every guest feel welcome and at home.   We thank you for your feedback and look forward to extending our hospitality to you on your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Location is good within walking distance.  Description says shuttle every 15 mins. but by the time you walk to shuttle area you might was well walk into park.  I would pack your own shower gel and soap as the soap in hotel just melts away. Beds were comfy.  A/C loud.  Family hotel as there is some noise.
Manager Response: Shuttles to the Park aren't necessary since we are located very close to the main entrance of Disneyland. In fact, we are just 600 steps away! We are sorry to hear you were not a fan of the shampoo and soap. Luckily it's just temporary; we are re-branding and are ordering new products soon.  Thanks for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Perfect for a Night or Two in Disney
Summary: The front desk was exceptional, the location is perfect but the rooms are drab. We stayed one night during our honeymoon because we wanted something affordable and close to the park. There are plenty of places to grab a snack or coffee before you leave and a Walgreens not too far away. I would recommend to a friend who is looking for the same thing. The outside is super cute and charming in a Disney way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our close proximity to Disneyland can't be beat! We are delighted that you had a pleasant stay, and we are excited to share that we are in the preliminary stage of renovating all of our guest rooms. Stay tuned!

Summary: Great place to stay with a family. The kids enjoyed the pool. Short walk to Disneyland/California Advenure. The Pizza Press next door has great food if you don't mind standing in line(it's popular).   Being able to see the nightly fireworks from the balcony and the pool was a bonus. You can bring the little ones back to the hotel, get them ready for bed and watch from just outside the room.   We had the family suite, accommodated 2 adults and 3 kids comfortably. 2 fridges in the room so we had plenty of room for the groceries.   The only negative I have is that the parking spots are really tight.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate that you mentioned our spacious rooms, friendly customer service, and of course our proximity to Disneyland. We are delighted to have been a part of the magical memories you and your family created during your visit. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location. Staff need to pay better attention to the details
Summary: Beds were very comfortable, room was clean, location was walkable to Disneyland. Had to request the correct number of towels. Then next day had to request hot cups, and then again towels. You'd think they would have a checklist before leaving the room.  Replacement items were brought up fairly promptly.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our comfortable beds and close proximity to Disneyland. It is standard to include 4 sets of towels in Double Queen Rooms. If there is a 5th person and extra towels are requested, we are more than happy to accommodate that. We are glad that your requested items were delivered promptly to your room.  Thank you for sharing your comments. We hope to see you again next time!

Summary: I'm here now and I have to say I still love this place...Great place to stay for families , very clean lots of food choices around! Right across the street from the happiest place on earth . you can see Ithe fireworks from here. Will be back next year for sure!
Manager Response: We are delighted and grateful to be your hotel of choice when visiting the Disney Parks. Our location and fireworks view can't be beat! Thank you very much for the positive feedback. See you next year!

Summary Heading: Perfect Location And Great Budget Hotel
Summary: This isn't the Disneyland Hotel, but it definitely serves as a great place to stay for those wanting to visit the parks. It's also a lot closer (literally across the street). We found our stay to be pleasant and quiet, with great service. And as mentioned, the location can't be beat, especially for the price. The only complaint I have is that the hot tub wasn't really hot, but more like lukewarm, which is probably great in the summer, but not so much in February. Another minor complaint is that we never could get the WiFi to work properly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so happy that your family enjoyed the conveniences we provide at the Camelot Inn & Suites, and we are glad you found it to be of great value. We look forward to seeing you again next time!

Summary: Just spent a week at the Camelot and was quite pleased with this hotel.  The location can't be beat.  It took less than 10 minutes to walk to Disney and some of that is the wait at the lights to cross the street.  We could see the fireworks right outside our door.  We had a suite with 3 beds and a sofa (which I believe was a pull out bed).  The beds were very comfortable.  Two mini-fridges gave us enough room to keep our drinks cold.  The microwave also came in handy.  McD's is right next door if you need a coffee or quick breakfast, although quick is not always the best descriptor as it is almost always a zoo there.  The coin operated laundry room on the main level came in handy and the washers/driers were quick.  Our room had a decent sized safe which was nice.  There are many
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking the time to write your review. We are happy that your family enjoyed the convenience of our location, our attention to detail, and the fireworks view from our property. Your feedback is much appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again in the future! :)

Summary Heading: Great Location for a Disney Stay
Summary: I chose this place for our recent girls' weekend at Disneyland.  I booked 2 rooms.  The front desk staff was super nice and gave us connecting rooms which we really enjoyed.  The rooms were very nice, clean and in good conditions, and the location can't be beat.  Valet parking was free which isn't the case with a lot of the Harbor Blvd resorts.  There is a small but nice sundry store on property which came in handy.  We have stayed in several of the motels along Harbor, and the Disney hotels, as we are Disney annual passholders and this one has been my favorite.  I have already booked another weekend stay for May.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate that you mentioned our attention to cleanliness, customer service, and convenience of our location. We hope you and your friends created many magical memories during your visit! See you in May!

Summary: We had a suite with 3 queens and it was well worth it! We could see the fireworks from the balcony and it is across the street from the entrance from Disneyland. The price was very reasonable and we would happily return. Having 2 mini fridges in the room was an extra bonus as I figured we would only have one. It is not as fancy as the chain hotels and no breakfast, but the price is not as high either and the location is perfect!
Manager Response: We are so happy that your family enjoyed the conveniences we provide at the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites, and we are glad you found it to be of great value. We look forward to seeing you again next time!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel multiple times and LOVE the location. It's so convenient to be that close to the entrance to Disneyland and to also have McDonalds right next door. The room was very clean and we loved watching the fireworks from the pool located on the top deck. Definitely a great place to stay!!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience. Our 4th floor pool deck is an ideal place to watch Disney's awesome fireworks show. We are glad to hear our convenient location worked well for your family.

Summary: We loved this place it was so close to disneyland and food options around. easy to check in and check out. Pool was great. the room was nice and clean. It smelled really good too. We will definitely stay here again. thank you Camelot Inn.
Manager Response: Your positive review is much appreciated. We are looking forward to extending our hospitality to you again soon!

Summary: I received a very good rate of $99 a night this February and went for it! I had stayed at the sister hotel and had a good experience so why not? I knew I paid for a king room, come to find out its its own mini-suite! Complete with a fridge and sitting area and a small balcony overlooking the park! WOW!   We arrived a few hours early for check in but they accommodated us just fine.The room was clean and cool, the linens were fresh, the bathroom was spacious, the TV had many channels which we didn't anticipate. Parking was a breeze, plus they offer FREE valet! McDonalds is right next door in case you're hungry or thirsty!  We didn't see the pools but were right across from them, I was very much impressed by this small hotels high standards and will DEFINITELY book with them again.
Manager Response: We are so delighted that you enjoyed the Camelot Inn & Suites as much as our sister property. Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the King Mini Suite and our customer service. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My family and I are from Sydney 2 adults, 3 kids. We stayed in a double queen with a rollaway. The location was beyond fantastic. We were in and out of the parks every few hours to eat and rest. It's a hop skip and leap away from McDonald's, which comes in so handy on those nights you need a quick dinner and head off back to the parks, there is also he pizza press a few doors down which is very reasonably priced and yummy. But The truth is the customer service here is what really made our stay outstanding. We were greeted by Carlos on arrival and he seemed to be there to help and check on us almost anything we needed. He assisted us without any hesitation not once or twice but without failure every time. From booking and confirming tours and pick up times To ensuring we had the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking the time to write your review. We are happy that your family enjoyed the convenience of our location and the fireworks view from our property. Carlos is a valued team member and we will be sure to share your kind words with him. See you next time :)

Summary: Perfect access to Disneyland.  Lovely and helpful people working the property. Pricy for the quality of lodging, but assuming that one is not there for the lodging, perfect place to stay for very easy access to Disneyland and California Adventure Park, which is what you are going to pay for.  I just checked and see that it is less pricey for other dates.  I think we ended up being there over a lot of school winter breaks, which is one of the times prices go up. Walk right across the street and you are there. Added benefits, very reasonable parking rates and  free Wi-Fi.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are delighted that you appreciated the proximity of the property to the parks and hope you will come back to visit us again very soon.

Summary: Check in isn't until 3pm and we'd just arrived by van from our cruise at 1030am.  The front desk staff initially told us that we'd have to wait a while since it wasn't even check out time yet. Thankfully, after just a few minutes they informed us that they had a room available and within 30 minutes of arriving, we were on our way to that room.  The family suite was clean and spacious. The staff couldn't have been any more friendly...even the housekeeper was great.  My 3 year old son managed to clog the toilet shortly after arriving and within about 5 minutes, someone was there to fix it. It was no more than a 10 minute walk from our room to the ticket counter at Disney.  If I remember correctly, there were only two motels that were closer. Besides being so conveniently close to
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience. We are glad to hear our convenient location worked well for your family. See you next time. :)

Summary: We arrived early in the morning, and they found us a room straight away. We were exhausted and really appreciated this because we didn't book an early checkin. We arrived mid week, low season, so they had a free room.   We were in room 330, right in the front of the hotel with the little balconies. Some previous reviews complained about noise from the street, but we didn't hear any noise with the doors closed. It was fun to stand on the balcony and watch the hordes walk by and towards the park. I would recommend this room. It was HUGE. The beds were comfy, wifi worked fine, everything was clean and in good shape -- the aircon was nice and cold. The housekeeping staff were really friendly. They folded towels and toilet paper into elephants and flowers, fun for our little girl.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience at the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites. We are delighted that we were able to accommodate early check in for your family, and we are happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious rooms, convenient amenities and close proximity to Disneyland. Our staff strives to make each guest's stay a memorable one.   We look forward to extending our hospitality to you again in the future.

Summary: Drove down from Elk Grove to Anaheim to go to Disneyland. After 6+ hours, we easily found the Camelot, right across from the park. I mean literally it takes 5 minutes to get to the park. The room was spacious the beds were comfortable. The only thing that was interesting was the parking. Due to a lack of parking they valet park your car and often there is a line of cars down the middle of the lot. Nothing big, just never encountered that before. Pool was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback. We are delighted that you appreciated our proximity to the Disney Parks. In fact, we are just 600 steps away from the Main Entrance and we offer a fantastic view of Disney's famous firework display.

Summary Heading: Good hotel if you just need a bed
Summary: The Camelot Inn was a good location for a Disney stay, just across from the park entrance. We arrived around 11 PM, and after checking in noticed a black, gritty puddle of some sort in the bathroom sink. The good news is that they have onsite maintenance, but while our focus was getting to bed, that was delayed while we waited for maintenance to figure out what was in our sink. Of course, after that I had doubts on how frequently the room was getting cleaned. I almost would have rather preferred they find us another room, simply so for the experience of walking into a clean room. After our first night, the room was nice to stay in. The walls were thin, and staying right next to a stairwell was fairly noisy, although, we heard the people above us walking as well so the hotel may
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here while visiting Disneyland..... Very convenient! Clean room, friendly staff, and we would definitely stay here again! We were on the 4th floor and could view the fireworks easily. Within walking distance to quite a few eateries....
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your review. We are happy that your family enjoyed the convenience of our location and especially the fireworks view from our property. We look forward to seeing you again next time!

Summary: This place is perfectly situated across the road from Disneyland resort.  Our room was a good size, clean and I loved that the sink was separate from the bathroom.  We were able to watch the fireworks from the pool area on the nights we were not at Disneyland too.  There are plenty of family friendly restaurants near by.  I would recommend this hotel to my friends.
Manager Response: We are delighted your family enjoyed the great fireworks view from our terrace level pool. Your positive review is much appreciated and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was our second stay at Camelot Inn and Suites. My daughter and I stayed for six nights (3rd Feb to 9 Feb 2016). We shared a two queen bed room on the fifth floor, room 520. It was plenty big enough for us and our four suitcases. Everything was clean and bright. Beds and pillows super comfortable. Very quiet on this floor as there is no one above and it is located further back from the street. Staff, when interacting with guests, are friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this spot, so close to Disneyland Resort for families, couples and singles. Rates are highly competitive, laundry on site, gift hut and 24 Hour reception. Our first choice in Disney accommodation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate that you mentioned our spacious rooms, friendly customer service, and of course our proximity to Disneyland. We are delighted to have been a part of the magical memories you and your daughter created during your visit. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We reserved two rooms, one of them was a family suite that slept eight.  My daughter and her family of six stayed there. It was awesome! It had a king bed and sofa bed in one room, and two queens in the other. Both rooms have refrigerators and microwaves's and lots of places to put clothes.    When we arrived, Patrick was a great help and very courteous to us. We had forgotten some discount coupons and he gave us his email address to send those to him and made several copies for us for no cost.  He answered all the questions we had and he couldn't have been nicer! The room was clean and well stocked, and we did not have a problem with noise. We did stay on the top floor (fifth) which was great to be able to see the fireworks across the street at Disneyland at night.  We grabbed
Manager Response: Your positive feedback is very much appreciated. We are delighted our friendly staff, comfortable rooms, and convenient location stood out to you and your family. Hopefully you were able to take advantage of the fireworks view from our terrace level pool. We look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: This used to be my go to Disneyland hotel.  Until a bunch of things were taken from my room, including a prescription medication.  I went to speak to the front desk to see if they knew what might have happened, and the crotchety old manager immediately started accusing me of accusing them of theft, even though I had never said such things.  I informed them that I would be involving the authorities because I have been involved in prescription fraud before.  At this point, the front desk person left me alone with the manager.  After trying for another 15 minutes to get this awful person to stop jumping down my throat, I returned to my room.  Upon returning to my room, I discovered my prescription sitting on the table.  However none of my other items had been recovered.  When I
Manager Response: Dear Heather,  We do remember you as our guest last Fall and are happy you were able to locate the misplaced medication. On rare occasions, our lost and found department  will report clothing articles that are found mixed in with the bed linen.   Our housekeeping staff has been made aware of the importance of checking all towels and bed linen before removal from guest rooms so that similar incidents are avoided in the future.   Please accept our sincerest apologies for the temporary misplacement of some of your items.

Summary Heading: Great location, huge room, super value!
Summary: We have stayed at almost every hotel within walking distance and this one is by far the best! We got a great deal on the family suite and we were surprised with how much room we had. Usually when you have eight people in a room you're tripping over luggage and strollers the whole time. Thankfully, that was not the case with this room. There was more than enough space for us all to be comfortable. The room was also clean and recently updated. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are delighted and grateful to be your hotel of choice when visiting the Disney Parks. Our spacious and comfortable Family Suite sounds like it was the perfect option for your stay. Thank you very much for the positive feedback. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My daughter and I just stayed for 6 nights and it was great. Really close to Disney - comfortable beds and pillows - quiet - great pizza place next door. Fridge - microwave - safe - cleaned great every day. Only thing I would have them change is the shower head - I like more pressure - would not hesitate to recommend to friends or family
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate that you mentioned our attention to cleanliness, customer service, and convenience of our location. We hope you and your daughter created many magical memories during your visit!

Summary Heading: Everything Great, Except The Bed Bugs.
Summary: The Anaheim Camelot is a great place to stay if you are a family or a group of friends needing enough bedding for 7 to 8 people. The location is perfect,just across the road from the Disneyland entrance. There are several good places to eat within walking distance. You can also watch the fireworks from your room balcony or the pool, which is heated and can be used in the winter months. The staff were excellent and gave us an early check in which was great after a long flight from Australia. Our only problem was that the room had bed bugs and my wife and kids suffered from bites with welts and itching all over.When we informed the staff they were very apologetic and immediately organised a thorough cleaning of our room. I would have loved to give the Camelot a 5 out of 5 rating
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and again we apologize for the inconvenience you and your family encountered.  Once this issue was reported , our maintenance and housekeeping team took immediate action to rectify the problem. Since your visit, our guest rooms have been thoroughly inspected,  and you can rest assured all rooms are clean and cleared of any findings.   We are glad that you enjoyed the fireworks from outside your room and pool area.  We hope you created fond memories to cherish at the Happiest Place on Earth.

Summary: The rooms are huge...easy to wheel a double stroller into. Love the double vanity. Very clean! Very updated! You can watch the Disneyland fireworks from your room...or the pool.  I don't like the parking. It's costly and tight. But love how close it is to the parks and how clean and comfortable it is.
Manager Response: Your positive review is much appreciated. We are delighted that your family took advantage of the fireworks view from our terrace level pool. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Camelot...hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great hotel, Great facilities. Really close to Disneyland in fact on about 5 minutes away! Within walking distance to some great eating places. Across the road from a bus stop which will take you to Target or the CVS Pharmacy. Great price really cheap seeming how close it is to Disneyland. Great view of the Disneyland fire works late at night.  Would recommend this to any family. :):)
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your review. We are happy that your family enjoyed the convenience of our location and especially the fireworks view from our property. See you next time :)

Summary: We stay here each time we visit Disney. One of the rare hotels in the area with a family suite that sleeps 7. Great staff, clean rooms, comfy beds,  good cable tv, scooter and pram hire onsite. Never fails to deliver close to Disneyland .
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed our spacious and comfortable Family Suite during your most recent visit. Thank you for the positive feedback. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here this past weekend and the LOCATION is perfect!! Rooms were clean and were always cleaned before we returned from the park! The front desk was so nice and we truly enjoyed our stay :) When exhausted at the park it was nice to walk right across the street to our hotel! They also have a small shop there to purchase water or snacks before heading into the park as well
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your positive experience with us. We appreciate that you mentioned our attention to cleanliness, customer service, and convenience of our location. We hope to be your hotel of choice during your next visit!

Summary: Value for money. Cross the road and there is the entrance to Disney,so close. We had the family suite which accommodated 6 adults easily. Clean. Comfy beds.  There is an IHOP couple of doors down and a great  cafe close by for breakfast in the other direction.Of course if you are desperate there is McDonalds next door to.Would be great place for small children as can go back to hotel for rest during the day at Disneyland. Staff friendly and helpful,allowed us to leave our luggage in their storeroom while we went shopping after checking out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback! Our spacious Family Suite sounds like it was the perfect choice for your party of 6. We are delighted you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland and we hope to see you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: I booked two King rooms about nine months before we travelled here in September.  There were only two of us travelling but we like to have our own rooms so I booked two rooms.  The hotel is right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.    We booked directly through the hotel and asked for a room with a view of the fireworks at Disneyland.  The reason I booked through the hotel was that I was hopeful that doing so would improve our chances of getting such a room.  On their website they do make a point of noting that check-in is not until 4, which is fine.  We arrived earlier than that, stored out bags and came back at around 3.  They allowed us to check in thinking that we had only booked one room.  When I pointed out we had booked two rooms, the staff member pretended
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.   As you mentioned, check in time is at 4 pm.  We are delighted to hear that our front desk staff member was able to provide an early check in for one of your rooms prior to the check in time. We apologize for assigning a room with Two Queen Beds (Twin  bedded rooms are not available at our property) for the 2nd room, but are happy to hear that a King room did become available, and that you enjoyed your accommodations especially the great view of Disneyland's famous firework display.   It was indeed a pleasure having you as our guests and hope you created many "magical" memories to cherish for years to come.

Summary: If you are looking for very close proximity-- walking distance-- to gates of Disneyland and California Adventures, you can't get much closer than this without being on site.  It's not more than a 10 minute walk for an adult.   This makes for a very convenient Disney experience.    This place is an "Inn" so it doesn't have a hotel feel (no breakfast bar or eating area), but it is friendly and there are all kinds of chain eateries in the vicinity from Mimi's Cafe to McDonalds to Pizza to Ihop (though I recommend La Brea Bakery in Downtown Disney).   If you stand on the balcony of the 4th or 5th floor at night, you have an excellent view of the 9:30pm Disney fireworks show and you can see the Matterhorn "erupting" or smoldering, depending on if your glass is half full. This makes
Manager Response: Since we are just a 5-10 minute walk from Disneyland's Main Entrance, our guests have the convenience of walking back to their rooms for a break from all the fun at the Parks. We are delighted that your family was able to enjoy the fantastic fireworks view from our property!   We apologize that your phone call went unanswered and we assure you that this is not common practice. Guest satisfaction is our priory. Our Front Desk Manager has been made aware of this issue and we appreciate you bringing it to our attention.

Summary: It's very close to Disneyland and not a far walk at all about 3 hotels from the stop light into Disney. We didn't have a car but there is a charge for parking your car at the hotel. We had a little problem with our reservation but other wise it's a nice hotel. The beds were comfortable. I didn't have a problem with noise but the other person staying in my room did. It's a nice place to see fireworks. The pool is not very heated and the hot tub is very small. There is no breakfast available. The room was clean. Some times the shower was not hot. When i took my shower at 11 pm I had no problem. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback. We are delighted that you appreciated our proximity to the Disney Parks. In fact, we are just 600 steps away from the Main Entrance and we offer a fantastic view of Disney's famous firework display.   We look forward to extending our hospitality to you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed for 3 sleepless nights.  The walls are paper-thin so we heard absolutely everything and we were up fairly late, the noise all around from next door, above our heads, didn't stop until after 2:00am.  Look, we know that we are across from Disneyland and people will be up late, but the walls offer no buffer and might as well not be there at all.  There should be a reasonable expectation of at least some quiet at night and there wasn't.  We called on the first night because of the thumping above us and they said they'd take care of it but it never stopped.  We switched rooms and the people across were obnoxiously loud into the wee hours.  No rest, maybe 2-3 hours of sleep off and on as I was woken up.  It isn't the hotel's fault that people make noise, but the design of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review...It is surprising to learn that you could not sleep due to noise factors as our walls are designed with soundproof materials. Our doors and windows are also insulated to provide a quiet setting.  We apologize that your experience at the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites was less than satisfactory.

Summary Heading: Helpful Staff, Good location, but too noisy,
Summary: I would like to give the staff, housekeeping, and valets five stars, but I need to give the rooms a 1-2 star.  They were not bad upon first sight, but the noise level was ridiculous.  We stayed from 1/2-1/5/16.  The first night we were in room 307, and someone above us was stomping or jumping late into the night that we had to call to complain.  The staff was courteous, and said they'd look into it.  If they did contact the occupants, it only made them more mad, because shortly after they seemed to increase the noise out of spite.    The next day when we tried to nap mid-day with our toddler, but noise continued whether through an adjoining room or above, we couldn't tell.  I asked the front desk if we could switch to a room on the top floor, as we had two more nights there.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very affordable for our Disney trip
Summary: We stayed the seven of us in a suite. It was within our budget. I was disappointed that there was no breakfast buffet as there is at the sister hotel the Tropicana, and the parking was much narrower than the Tropicana, but the stay was pleasant, the room was clean, the pool was great, everything went well and the location can't be beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us! Our spacious Family Suite sounds like it was the perfect choice for your family of 7 and we are delighted you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland.  We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed in the lack of breakfast options. The Tropicana and Camelot both discontinued their continental breakfast 3 years ago. However, the Tropicana's coffee house and mini market is a great choice for the morning. Hopefully you'll be able to give it a try next time.

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel near the Disneyland Resort without the Resort hotel prices.
Summary: One of the older hotels near the park but very clean and neat. Housekeeping was prompt and polite, we enjoyed our stay and would use this hotel again.  The hotel is about a five minute walk from the park entrance and the rooms have a great view of the evening fireworks display.  Free wifi is a huge bonus for us as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad your family enjoyed our clean, comfortable rooms and convenient amenities. We hope you created many "magical" memories during your visit.

Summary Heading: Best hotel if you're going to Disney
Summary: The price is low and the accomodations are all great, the rooms were clean everyday, PLUS (big plus) it's literally across the street from Disney... Next to it is a mart, an iHop and a McDonald's... The exits to 5 south/north that take you to all the parks are 1 minute away!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We are delighted that you appreciate the cleanliness and convenient location of our property. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We go to Disneyland for New Years Eve nearly every year.  We have been at several ones as our main selections.  This year we tried a different one  Hotel is a 10 minute walk to the gates depending on your walking speed and signals   There are only 3 handicap parking spaces.   During big holidays parking is at a premium .  There are not enough spaces and have to attent to double park your car.  You can see the fireworks from pool area and or middle of the floor further back you are from front better the view  The room we had was a king suite.     Had pull out couch with plenty of walking around room.  Had both frig and microwave + safe.  Bath room was in two parts.   Sink was outside tub/toilet area.  Large sink area plenty of room to more around for 3 people  Tub/tolite area was
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating the New Year with us! We are so happy that you enjoyed your most recent visit and liked your accommodations. Our Family Suites are the ideal choice for families of 6. With our close proximity to Disneyland, the fireworks can be viewed on the corridor outside each guest room. Our 4th floor pool also offers a fantastic view of the firework display as well.  We are very sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the parking. There are times when we are running at 100% occupancy and it becomes necessary to valet vehicles in order to ensure that all guests are able to park on site.  Thank you for your review. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I am beyond impressed with this hotel!  We were driving down to Disneyland earlier than expected and would need a hotel to stay at.  They were listed on the Hotel Tonight App, so we figured we would give them a try.  We called to book direct, but their price was significantly more than what the Hotel Tonight App was offering, so we just booked through there.  We have used the app before with no problem.  They offer valet and self parking, we don't mind self parking (I believe valet is the same price), so we told him we could just park and check in.  My husband checked us in and it went really easy.  I normally don't like paying for parking, but you are so close to the park that you don't need to drive.  The walk is so so close!!!!  We have annual passes this year, so parking is
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback. We are delighted that you appreciated our proximity to the Disney Parks. In fact, we are just 600 steps away from the Main Entrance and we offer a fantastic view of Disney's famous firework display.   We would like to wish you a very Happy New Year and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was the perfect location and place to stay while on our trip to Disneyland. It's right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. It's also next door to several restaurants such as McDonalds where we grabbed a quick breakfast every morning...saving us a ton of money. Something that turned out to be a huge plus was having a wheelchair rental place on site at the hotel. After an injury, it was so helpful to be able pick up the rental wheelchair at the hotel and ride into the park and ride it outside of the park every day. Disneyland wheel chair rentals can go no farther that the office where you rent. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Your positive review is much appreciated! We are glad that our onsite wheelchair and scooter rental shop, One Stop Mobility, was a convenient choice for you. We hope your family made many magical memories during your visit and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This ticks all the boxes for a family vacation to Disney. Clean, friendly staff, incredibly close to Disneyland. The fireworks can be viewed from you balcony. The one downside is probably that you can also hear the fireworks, and the car alarms going off after. It wasn't loud enough to wake up the kids if they were in bed, and usually after a day running around at the park, us adults were too tired to care anyway. There is a fridge and microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your favorable review and we are delighted your selected the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites while visiting the parks.  In addition to Microwaves and Refrigerators, our rooms also offer complimentary wi-fi and in room safes.  We hope to see you again soon!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel I had an event at Disneyland and it was perfect I walked across the street and I was in Disneyland . The location is prime you can walk to Disneyland back-and-forth all day to your room . If you want to take a break you just walk across the street and you are in your room . The room had everything I needed it was a huge room clean nice perfect I'd recommend this hotel to anyone . You can't beat the great price.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your most recent visit with us and liked your accommodations .  With our close proximity to Disneyland the fireworks can be viewed on the corridor outside each guest room.  Our 4th floor pool also offers a fantastic view of the firework display as well.  Enjoy your Holidays and we look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth".

Summary: This hotel is in the best location, literally only minutes from the Disneyland entrance. Rooms were large- we had 4 people sharing and there was more than enough room for all of our luggage etc to stay comfortably. Beds were very comfortable. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this hotel given the price was relatively cheap in comparison to other hotels. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your positive feedback.  We are delighted that you appreciated the proximity of the property to the parks and hope you will come back to visit us again very soon.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Stayed here for one night before moving to another hotel that we booked beforehand. Location was absolutely convenient. Rooms were clean and sufficient. Close to all the fast food restaurants so no complaints about the venue at all! Good stay!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your most recent stay at the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth".  Happy Holidays!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights. We had a mini king suite and it worked well for 2 adults and one child. The room is very basic, but we didn't spend much time there so it was fine. I would have liked to have a TV listing or information about the area and perhaps food suggestions, but I can't complain too much because the room was clean and the employee's were friendly.  Parking is not free so be ready for that. We paid about $10 per night and I think I saw a notice that the fee is going up in January 2016. Also, check out is at 11am but you are allowed to park until 2pm for free on the day you leave. Anything after 2pm is about $14.00.
Manager Response: We are very happy that you enjoyed your visit and thank you for leaving your positive feedback.  The Anaheim Camelot offers a view of the fireworks from the outdoor corridor on every floor and the 4th floor pool and gazebo also provides and excellent view.    We wish you and yours a very happy holiday season and hope to see you again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.

Summary: We stayed here on our first night after flying in from Australia.  Check in went very smoothly and person was very friendly and helpful.  Our room was near the swimming pool and vending machine but was not noisy at all.  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable.    We checked out the next day and reception held our luggage until later that night.  They were always courteous and friendly.  Would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and we hope you will stay a few days longer us on your next visit to the states and the "Happiest Place on Earth".  Wishing you and yours a very Happy Christmas!

Summary Heading: Changed from where we normally stay
Summary: This visit we changed hotels to the Camelot Inn and Suites. I wasn't expecting much, knowing that the hotel has been around for a while I expected an old but OK place to stay. But, the price was right. Once we got there, I was pleasantly surprised! The rooms were very clean and up to date, the whole hotel was spotless and the staff was extremely helpful and friendly. I felt like I was staying on site at a Disney hotel. The location was perfect, I could see the Matterhorn and the nightly fireworks from my room, and only had to cross the street to enter the park. I'd give the hotel a perfect score except for the parking. They don't have enough spaces for all of the rooms. To be fair, we were there on a very busy weekend. Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are happy that you decided to try us out and was pleasantly surprised with your accommodations and location of our property.  We have some very exciting plans in the future for the Camelot Inn & Suites and will be sharing this news soon.    On behalf of all of all the team members, we wish you and yours a joyous holiday season and prosperous New Year.

Summary: This clean, comfortable place is a short walk to the Disney Park. Less than ten minutes to get there. The staff were friendly. Check in was easy. It is a bit of a walk with luggage to the back of the hotel. This is not a luxury hotel but if you want an good base for the parks this is it. Excellent value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback and we are delighted that you were happy with your accommodations and proximity of the hotel to the parks. Our parking attendants/bellmen will be happy to assist you with your luggage on your next visit.    We hope to see you again soon.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Took a weekend trip to Disneyland and stayed in a family suite with two friends and three family members all adults. This is a primo location as far as an off resort hotel goes for Disney. Park is right across the street, rooms were clean and very large. Family suite is great. I will stay at this hotel each time I visit Disney from now on. PERFECT OFF RESORT LOCATION
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive feedback and we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and the close proximity to Disneyland.    We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My friend and I had a 2 night stay here recently on our U.S. trip. The staff were friendly and location was across the road from Disneyland, just perfect. Took us less the 5 minutes to get to the entrance of the theme park. Rooms were clean, spacious and comfortable. We had amazing views from our balcony of the fireworks. The hotel pool & jacuzzi area was located on the roof which was another perfect spot to enjoy the fireworks. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your room and from your balcony.  We have a handful of front rooms with and without balconies offering a fantastic view of both parks and the famous Disneyland Firework display.  Thank you so much for your positive feedback and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.  Enjoy this upcoming Holiday Season!

Summary: Loved staying here so much, so close to the parks, close to foods and super friendly workers that are happy to have a conversation with you. What made this place even more for myself is you get an amazing view of the fireworks every night that are coming from Disney land. Will be going back there when I visit the US again next time.
Manager Response: It is always nice to receive such wonderful reviews and we thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites.  Because our property is located across from the famous Matterhorn each room offers a fantastic view of the fireworks from each room on the corridor. The 4th floor gazebo and pool area also provides a perfect view.  We look forward to extending our hospitality to you on your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth".

Summary: My husband and I have stayed at the Camelot 2x, first August 2010, second June 2015. Both stays were excellent, we were happy to see they've updated the lobby since our first stay and are continuing to keep up the property. It's a cute theme that feels in keeping with the Disneyland spirit. Rooms are clean and very comfortable, and pretty generously sized for a motel; they are definitely a step up from a couple other hotels we've stayed at on Harbor. No microwave, but you do have a nice mini fridge. We've never had any issues with housekeeping. Beds are comfortable, and there are several restaurants within walking distance (Mimi's Cafe is great). The staff have been professional and helpful; we added an extra night to our reservation and had to reserve it as a separate
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us! We are delighted that you found our rooms to be spacious and comfortable. In fact, each guest room comes equipped with mini refrigerator and microwave.   We hope your family created many magical memories during your stay and we look forward to extending our hospitality to you again on your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth!"

Summary: The room was exactly as shown on the website.  I really liked being able to watch the fireworks from the hotel pool/jacuzzi area.  The jacuzzi is small and the jets did not seem to work well.  I like that the entire pool was 3 1/2 feet deep so I could stand anywhere.  My only suggestion to travelers is to bring extension cords for charging electronic devices.  Older hotels like this have few outlets and this was no exception.  My roommate unplugged the bedside lamp (very inconvenient) without telling me because she wanted to charge her phone next to the bed and the one outlet was being used for the clock and the lamp.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Camelot for your Disney vacation! We are glad  you took advantage of the fabulous fireworks view from our terrace-level pool. We really appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very convenient for a visit to either of the Disney parks. Good value, excellent in room facilities, comfortable beds. Friendly and helpful staff. Small niggle, paid for self park but had to valet as space is limited. This meant tipping every time we wanted to take the car out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us on your most recent visit to the Disneyland area.  We hope you had the opportunity to visit our 4th floor pool and Jacuzzi.  Great view of the fireworks in the evening!  We hope to see you again on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: As said before this hotel is in a great location to DL Maingate. Rooms are nothing flash, but were clean and spacious. We had a two room family suite for 3 nights which was great for our needs. One of our sons was sick and housekeeping were very good to help us out.  Reception staff were hit and miss, either over the top helpful or barely interested. We required a late checkout as my son still was quite unwell and they did accomodate us. There is a good view of the fireworks from the top floors or pool area of the hotel. Pool is quite small so can get a bit crowded at times. There is a coin operated laundry but make sure you have enough coins as change machine was faulty and swallowed my money, reception accepts no responsibility, but the lady in the scooter hire was most
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback as we consider your comments as a valuable tool to continuously improve in all aspects of customer service.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit and found our Family Suites accommodating for your needs.  Please come back again soon!

Summary: If you are looking for a roomy place to stay that is close to Disneyland, this is the place. The hotel is a little dated but it is clean. Some minor work here and there, like some wall paper in the bathroom that is starting to peel. The deluxe family 1 bedroom suite has a ton of space. It is basically 2 bedrooms with  a king bed, 2 queen beds and a sleeper sofa. The  room was plain and the bathroom on the small side but a bargain given how close to Disney. This hotel is closer to Disneyland than most of the Disney properties. From your door to the park entrance is maybe a10 minute stroll. And most of that is walk through the Disney parking lot. The hotels does not have many amenities, but there are plenty of places to grab breakfast nearby with IHOP, Denny's and more within 150
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for  taking the time to share your positive experience.  We agree that it is time to update our rooms and plans to renovate are in the preliminary phase.    Our lobby is completely renovated and hope you enjoyed the new look!  Again, thank you so much for your review and we hope you see you again on your next visit to the Anaheim area!!

Summary Heading: Conveniently across from Disneyland and McDonalds.  Comfortable & Family Friendly..
Summary: We stayed in a family 2 room suite (Room 205).  2 Queens in one room and 1 King in the main room.  Both rooms shared one Bathroom, but each had it's own TV and air conditioning.  A small kitchen with small sink, microwave, and mini-fridge provided all we needed for snacks and drinks.  The rooms were quite clean and housekeeping came by every day.  The is a coin laundry located on the premises which made it convenient.  There is a parking fee per day and they allowed us to park there when we arrived before check-in time and went to Disneyland.  Staff was friendly and helpful.   There is a scooter rental also located on the premises.  Being across from Disneyland made it really convenient and also having McDonalds right next door made it easy if you are hungry or thirsty (although
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed and positive review.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and enjoyed staying in one of  our family suites.  We hope you enjoyed your time at Disneyland and California Adventure and look forward to extending our hospitality to you and your family on your next visit!

Summary: Location! Location!! Location!!! Less than a 10 min walk to Disneyland entrance gates and McD's is right next door. As for the Inn itself we still find it well maintained and clean. Our first stay back in 2001 got us hooked on being just across the street from Disneyland. Fourteen years and five stays later I would still recommend this Inn as the place to stay. The rooms are clean, and the beds comfortable.
Manager Response: We were delighted to have you as our guests once again 14 years later!!!  Thank you so much for leaving such a nice review and we sincerely hope to see you again.  Hopefully sooner than 14 years from now!!! :)

Summary: I am picky... This place is very clean, lots of towels, mini fridge, microwave, comfy bed.  Easy walk to entrance of parks.  I didn't expect this much and was pleasantly surprised.  My only complaint was the wifi was not too reliable.  Highly recommend for a mid range hotel.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure accommodating you and your family and we sincerely appreciate your recommendation. We hope you created many magical memories during your stay and we look forward to extending our hospitality to you again in the future!

Summary: A great location 5 minute walk to the main gates of Disneyland. The double queen rooms are large and comfortably fit 4 people. The Wi-Fi was good. Plenty of food options in walking distance. The nightly fireworks can be view from the hotel balcony.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback and we are happy that your stay was memorable.  We hope you created many fun memories and look forward to your next visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth"!.

Summary: loved our stay at the Camelot Inn. Perfect location for Disney, just across the road, which after a long day in the park is just what you need. Great variety of restaurants close to the hotel.  Big rooms with very comfy beds, clean and safe and even got to watch the fireworks from our room the first night we arrived. Would definitely stay here again when visiting Disney.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit at the Anaheim  Camelot Inn & Suites and glad that you took advantage of the great view outside your room.  The 4th floor pool area is also a great place to enjoy the fireworks!!!  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel, close to Disney Land, functional, clean. Nowhere to put suitcases. Did not like bathroom shower, complicated set up, and wash basin outside after using toilet. One piece of soap for four days stay. Pool pictures are misleading. Noise from upstairs room. Staff very helpful. Plenty of nearby restaurants to pick from.
Manager Response: We are delighted the convenience of our location suited your family well! Hopefully next time you are able to take advantage of the fabulous fireworks view from our terrace level pool.   Please note each guest room includes a portable luggage rack to store suitcases. We are sorry you weren‚Äôt satisfied with the bathroom set up. By separating the vanity with sink from the shower room, 1 guest is able to privately use the restroom while another utilizes the sink area to brush teeth, apply makeup, etc. Housekeeping would have been happy to supply your room with more soap if requested.   We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again during your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: We stayed at the Camelot Inn and suites for 5 nights at the beginning of September. We were in a family suite which consisted of one room with a king bed, dining table, lounge and sink and the second room had 2 queen beds, bathroom and sink. Heaps of room for 2 adults and 2 children. We were on the 5th floor and could easily see the Disneyland fireworks! It was a very short (6 mins) walk to the gates of Disneyland. Staff were helpful and friendly. It has a coin operated laundry room which was very handy. It also had free wifi which was great!! If we were to ever come back to Disneyland again we would definitely stay here without question!!
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning the many conveniences the Anaheim Camelot Inn & Suites has to offer. Our Family Suite sounds like it was a perfect fit for your family and we hope next time you are able to take advantage of our heated terrace-level pool with Disney fireworks view. Your positive feedback is much appreciated and we hope to extend our hospitality to you again in the future! Have a wonderful day.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel mainly for its location, right across the street for Disneyland. It was very convenient for reaching the park in the morning and not needing to worry about parking our car, and being able to run back for forgotten items or a mid-afternoon break. We stayed in a Family Suite which was very well set up - two rooms with a door in between, one (with entrance door) a queen bed and a pull-out couch. The other room had two queens. Note that there is only one bathroom for the entire suite, which worked out fine for us but could be an issue for families that have many wanting to shower simultaneously. There was also a small kitchen area with table, fridge, and microwave. The service was adequate; we'd asked in advance for a room near the other member of our party,
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our spacious Family Suite and our close proximity to the Disney Parks. Since we are just a 6-7 minute walk from Disneyland's Main Entrance, our guests have the convenience of walking back to their rooms for a break from all the fun at the Parks.    We do our utmost to honor guest requests and we are sorry that a room near your family member‚Äôs was not available due to the hotel running at 100% occupancy. We hope your family made many magical memories during your Disney vacation!

Summary: First time staying at this hotel and overall we were very pleased.  The King family suite was great and provided the much needed space for 5 people.  We had 2 refrigerators, although one didn't work so well in keeping items cold.  The beds were comfortable enough and we were a short walk from the entrance to Disneyland. If you are planning to use the pool and hot tub a lot, then I'd suggest another hotel as both are very small.  Could use some updating, but would definitely recommend.  We had to check out a day early and the hotel was wonderful about refunding us for the last night.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure extending our hospitality to you and your family.
